loans.name: Maa Tarini Shg (A) Group

texts.en:
Sasmita is 35 years old, married and has two children. She lives in Chaulia Khamar, Dhenkanal. Sasmita is a housewife who is very happy and responsible. She alternates her household activities with her work in her business. She has a business of drying fish and selling them in the market of Dhenkanal district of Odisha, India. She already has had this business for four years, and it is going very well. 

At this time, Sasmita is requesting a loan to buy fish in bulk to resell. She says that this will help her in strengthening the business and responding to client demand.
 
This group is made up of neighbors and friends who formed the group Maa Tarini Self Help Group (A). The members of the group have selected Sasmita as their president. The common goal of the group is to increase their business activity and make a great asset for themselves.

loans.use: to buy fish in bulk to resell

loans.name: Annapurna Shg Group

texts.en:
Sebati, age 26, resides in the Mayurbhanj district of Odisha. She is a housewife and lives with her husband in a small village in a small house. In the daytime, she supports her husband in the agricultural activities of the family. She also is the leader of the Annapurna SHG (Self Help Group) of her village. These members of the community decided to take up loans for financially supporting their families. They take up alternate income-generating activities that would help them in contributing to their household income. 

Sebati wanted to support her husband by growing additional cash crops like vegetables in addition to the paddy and other crops they rely on. These vegetables are in high demand in the market, and the area is known for its high quality of vegetables. 

She has requested a loan for her SHG, so each one of them can take up such activities to support their families. She will use her loan portion to buy seeds, fertilizers and other necessary things for her farmland.

loans.use: to buy seeds, fertilizers and other necessary things for her farmland

loans.name: Yawa

texts.fr:
Agée de 40 ans, Yawa est mariée et mère de 04 enfants. 
Yawa est tisserande. En plus de son activité, elle a associé à sa profession la vente des légumes et des céréales. Elle s’approvisionne auprès des agriculteurs au marché de Notsé, une ville à 100km de la capitale. Elle travaille plus de 10h par jour.Yawa souhaite augmenter son stock par l’acquisition de 6 sacs de maïs afin de répondre au besoin de ses clients. 
Les bénéfices pourront lui permettre d’acheter des cadeaux  et de nouveaux vêtements pour ses enfants aux fêtes de fin d’année.
texts.en:
Yawa is 40 years old, married and has four children.  Yawa is a weaver by profession, but also sells vegetables and cereals.  She buys her supplies from farmers at the market in Notsé, a town which is 100kms from the capital.

Yawa works ten hours a day.  She would like to increase her stock by buying seven sacks of maize.  In this way, she will be able to respond to the demands of her customers.  Her profits will enable her to buy some présents and new clothes for her children, for the end of year festivities.

loans.use: acheter 07 to buy 7 sacks of maize.

loans.name: Gorgui

texts.fr:
Monsieur Gorgui, âgé de 59 ans, est un infirmier de profession, qui exerce le métier depuis 1983 ans. Il sert dans un poste de santé situé à environ 5km du quartier ou se trouve la caisse de l’IMCEC ou il a adhéré. Gorgui est un client fidèle qui a bénéficié de sept crédits. Ce dernier lui servira à continuer son activité parallèle qu’est l’embouche, qu’il pratique depuis maintenant plus de 5 ans. Avec les 300 000F CFA, il pourra acheter 3 vœux, qu’il confiera à des éleveurs de grandes masses de bœufs. Quelques mois après, il pourra commercialiser ces mêmes bœufs devenus matures.
Gorgui est marié et père de famille qui s’occupe de la dépense quotidienne de sa famille et de l’éducation de ses enfants.
Près de sa retraite, il développe comme projet d’ouvrir le magasin de sa maison pour en faire une boutique de vente de denrées alimentaires.
texts.en:
Monsieur Gorgui is 59 years old and has been a nurse since 1983. He works in a health clinic located about 5km from the IMCEC branch he joined. Gorgui is a loyal client who has had seven loans. This most recent loan will help him continue his parallel business—livestock fattening, which he has been practicing for more than five years. With his 300,000 FCFA, he will be able to buy three oxen that he will entrust to farmers of large herds of oxen. After a few months, he will be able to sell the now-mature oxen. 

Gorgui is married and a father. He manages his family's daily expenses and his children's education. As he nears retirement, he wants to open a shop in his home where he can sell food staples.

loans.use: buy three oxen that he'll raise and resell.

loans.name: Lilian Andrea

texts.es:
Gracias a la perseverancia y coraje de Lilian es que su hogar puede tener una buena estabilidad económica.

Ella prepara y vende comidas como almuerzos y comidas por encargo en el municipio de Bello, actividad que emprendió con el afán de buscar nuevos ingresos para el sostenimiento de su familia. 

Su esposo e hijos son la mayor motivación que tiene para trabajar diariamente y esforzarse para ser cada día mejor.

Ella espera poder impulsar su negocio con la compra de insumos y materia prima como ingredientes y desechables.

Con estos elementos ella podrá tener sus alimentos siempre disponibles y frescos para sus clientes.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener un restaurante en la misma zona para no perder a sus clientes.

Presta y aporta hoy, anímate!
texts.en:
Thanks to Lilian's perseverance and courage, she is able to enjoy financial stability at home.

Lilian prepares and sells meals, including lunch and dinner, and takes on commissions in the municipality of Bello. She started this business in order to earn an income to support her family.

Lilian's husband and children are her greatest motivation to go out and work every day, and put in the effort to be better.

Lilian hopes that she can drive her business forward by buying supplies such as ingredients and disposable cutlery and crockery.

With these items, Lilian will always be able to have her meals available and fresh for her customers.

Lilian's biggest dream is to own a restaurant in the local area so as not to lose customers.

Lend today and support Lilian!

loans.use: to buy supplies such as ingredients and disposable cutlery and crockery.

loans.name: Rafael Ernesto

texts.es:
Rafael de 69 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. 

Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. 

Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital que le prestó un amigo, este hombre inició con un pequeño negocio de venta de abarrotes de manera muy humilde.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido de frituras, cervezas y abarrotes para abasteces su pequeñísimo negocio. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica y poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones y garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.

Una de sus principales dificultades son las condiciones de vida que se viven en ciertos sectores del municipio de Bello.

Realiza un préstamo para que la vida de Rafael Sea mucho mejor en su negocio!
texts.en:
Rafael is 69 years old and has earned the love of all his neighbours owing to his friendliness and good sense of humour.

He loves his family, his main drive to fight every day and earn an income to survive.

Although Rafael did not have the money to start his own business, this did not stop him from achieving his dream of becoming a businessman. With a little capital that a friend lent him, Rafael started a small and humble business selling groceries.

Rafael still has more dreams though and that is why he is applying for a loan that he will use to buy fried snacks, beers and groceries to stock up his little business. 

Rafael hopes to improve his financial situation, to live out his old-age worry-free, and to guarantee his family a better future.

One of Rafael's greatest difficulties has been the living conditions of many areas of Bello municipality.

Loan to Rafael and make his business better!

loans.use: to buy fried snacks, beers and groceries to stock up his little business.

loans.name: Divino Niño Jesús 2 Group

texts.es:
Divino Niño Jesús 2 forma este grupo de 23 señoras, todas ellas mujeres jefas de familia que quieren un mejor bienestar para sus seres queridos. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de la pobreza 
Una persona que se destaca entre ellas es Alma, quien es la presidenta de este grupo, es una mujer muy sacrificada que se está esforzando por poder crecer y dar a su familia todo lo que necesitan para una vida digna sin privaciones.  Ella se dedica a la venta de prendas varias, y por medio de ese trabajo obtiene los medios para el día a día.
Pide este préstamo para poder comprar prendas varias para la venta, y de esa forma poder seguir con su negocio como lo viene haciendo, luchando por sus seres queridos.
texts.en:
The "Divino Niño Jesús 2" group has 23 members, all women, and all heads of family who want to give their loved ones better lives. The members are undergoing the poverty elimination survey.

One member of the group worth highlighting is Alma. She is the chair of this group and very self-sacrificing. She is working hard to grow and give her family everything that they need to have a decent life. 

Alma makes a living selling clothes and, through this work, she earns the money to cover daily expenses.

Alma is applying for this loan in order to buy clothing items to sell, to continue with her business, and to fight for her loved ones.

loans.use: to buy clothing items to sell.

loans.name: Aida

texts.ru: Аида успешно погасила кредит, использовав его по назначению, она благодарна Фонду Кива и всем, кто помог ей в финансировании. Аида вышла замуж. Она по-прежнему занимается перепродажей овощей. На сегодняшний день прибыль Аиды составляет 20,000 сом (KGS) в месяц. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, она обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 40,000 сом (KGS) на покупку овощей для реализации. Доходы от кредита Аида будет вкладывать в дальнейшее развитие ее бизнеса.
texts.en: Aida successfully paid off her loan after using it as intended.  She is very thankful to Kiva and to everyone who helped her obtain this financing.  (Since her previous loan), Aida got married.  She still sells vegetables.  She now makes a monthly income of 20,000 som (KGS).  In order to further expand her activity, she has turned to Bai Tushum for a loan of 40,000 som (KGS).  She will use this loan to buy vegetables for resale.  She will reinvest the earnings from her loan to further grow her business.

loans.use: to buy vegetables for resale in order to increase her inventory.

loans.name: La Palma Group

texts.es:
La sierra de Zongolica aloja una comunidad de clima fresco donde la mayoría de los habitantes se dedica a trabajar la tierra, sembrando caña o hule. En este lugar se formó el grupo La Palma, con personas dedicadas y entregadas su familia, sus nombres y actividades económicas son:

Jacinta-Venta De Abarrotes
Teodoro- Venta De Antojitos
Josué -Venta De Hule
Valentina- Venta De Antojitos
Daniel -Venta De Carne Y Quesos
Yolanda-Venta De Ropa Americana 

Doña Jacinta es una señora muy alegre, amable, respetuosa, trabajadora y carismática, está casada con don Apolinar y desde hace 8 años se han hecho cargo de un nieto que actualmente estudia la primaria. Ellos lo quieren como un hijo, lo cual es recíproco pues el niño los llama "papá" y "mamá". 

Jacinta tiene 15 años de experiencia vendiendo abarrotes. Al principio, acomodaba toda su mercancía en unas tablas, pero sus ganancias y los préstamos invertidos le ayudaron a comprar anaqueles y más variedad de productos para ofrecer mayor surtido. Con el tiempo también comenzó a rentar maquinitas (videojuegos) que adaptó en la tienda y que a diario atrae a los niños de las calles más cercanas. 

“Progresar con mi negocio y contar con mi nieto es la mejor motivación. El patrimonio que estoy haciendo es para él" expresa Jacinta. Ella da gracias a VisionFund por la oportunidad de tener un préstamo que utilizará para comprar aceite, galletas, huevos, frijol, azúcar, sopa, arroz, atún, sardinas y papel higiénico que son los productos que más vende. 

*La fotografía fue tomada en casa de la señora Jacinta quien viste de blusa color café y short blanco.
texts.en:
The Zonogolica mountains house a cool weather community where the majority of the residents are dedicated to working the land, planting sugar cane or rubber. In this place, the La Palma group was formed by people dedicated to family. Their names and jobs are:

Jacinta-Selling groceries
Teodoro- Selling street food
Josué -Selling rubber
Valentina- Selling street food
Daniel -Selling meat and cheese
Yolanda-Selling American clothing

Jacinta is a very happy, friendly, respected, hard working and charismatic woman. She is married to Apolinar and eight years ago was put in charge of a grandson who is in elementary school. They love him like a son,  which is reciprocated since the boy calls them "papa" and "mama".

Jacinta has 15 years experience selling groceries. At first, she laid out all of her merchandise on some tables but her income and the invested loans helped her to buy some shelves and more product variety to offer more stock. With time, she also began to rent some machines (video games) that she adapted in the store and they attract kids from the nearby streets on a daily basis.

"To progress with my business and take care of my grandson is the best motivation. What I am doing is for him", says Jacinta. She is thankful to VisionFund for the opportunity to have a loan that she will use to buy oil, cookies, eggs, beans, sugar, soup, rice, tuna, sardines and toilet paper, which are the products that she sells the most.

*The photograph was taken in the house of Jacinta who is wearing the brown blouse and white shorts.

loans.use: to buy oil, cookies, eggs, beans, sugar, soup, rice, tuna, sardines, toilet paper.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Judith, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Valencia, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Judith ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar sillas, mesas y surtido de gaseosas y frituras y de este modo aumentar el inventario de productos que vende alternamente a sus alimentos.

Una de sus principales dificultades es el alto costo de los insumos que utiliza en sus preparaciones.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Humble and hard working is Judith, a fighting woman who has dedicated a large part of her life to taking care of her children. She lives in the town of Valencia where she earns a living preparing varied food like lunches and breakfasts in a small restaurant.

Her food is known by her neighbors in the area who visit the restaurant because they know they will be able to eat well.

Judith has decided to improve her business and expand her sales. For this reason, she has requested a loan to buy chairs, tables and stock of sodas and fritters so she can expand her product inventory that she sells along with her food.

One of her main challenges is the high cost of ingredients that her dishes require.

This loan will allow her to get ahead in her business by obtaining the necessary income that gives her the opportunity to keep supporting her family and her business.

Support this woman with a loan and make her dreams come true!

loans.use: to buy chairs, tables and stock of sodas and fritters.

loans.name: Fray David

texts.es:
Fray, con 41 años de edad, es soltero y vive en compañía de sus padres. 

Nació y se crió en el campo, donde aprendió las labores agrícolas al lado de su padre; gracias a ello, hoy en día tiene cultivos de caña de azúcar, cuya cosecha es vendida y de esta manera obtiene los recursos para llevar el alimento a su hogar. 

El prestatario es un hombre pujante, luchador, dedicado a su familia y a su trabajo, eso lo motiva para trabajar largas jornadas y tratar de salir adelante; día a día lucha para sobrepasar los obstáculos que se le presentan, ha pasado por situaciones económicas difíciles debido al bajo precio de la panela en el mercado, lo que afecta el precio de la caña. 

Fray solicita el crédito para invertirlo en la compra de insumos agrícolas (abono, fertilizantes, pesticidas) con el fin de darle continuidad a su negocio y preparar sus cultivos para cosechar un producto de muy buena calidad, que le permita venderlo a un mejor precio para obtener mejores utilidades. 

Fray sueña con mejorar sus cultivos, ampliarlos para obtener de estos una buena renta mensual, que le permita brindarles mejores condiciones de vida a sus padres.

 Fray espera tu colaboración para mejorar su calidad de vida!
texts.en:
Fray, 41 years old, is single and lives with his parents.

He was born and raised in the countryside where he learned farm work alongside his father. Thanks to him, today he has sugar cane crops whose harvest is sold and, in this way, he obtains the resources to feed his family.

The borrower is a hard working man dedicated to his family and his work. This motivates him to work long days and to try to get ahead. Day after day he works hard to overcome obstacles that he faces. He has dealt with difficult economic situations due to the low price of unrefined cane sugar in the market, which affects the price of sugar cane.

Fray is requesting a loan to invest in the purchase of agricultural inputs (chemical and organic fertilizers, pesticides) with the goal of giving continuity to his business and to prepare his crops so he can harvest a very good quality product which allows him to sell at a better price to obtain better income.

Fray dreams of improving his crops, expanding them to obtain a good monthly profit which allows him to provide better living conditions for his parents.

Fray hopes your collaboration will improve his quality of life!

loans.use: to buy farming inputs like chemical and organic fertilizers and pesticides.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy fertiliser, irrigation and pesticides.

loans.name: Josue Group

texts.fr:
Mr SAMBO MARTIN est responsable du groupe JOSUE. Marié, il est père de 02enfants. Le plus âgé a 04ans et le moins a 01an. Personne ne va  à l’école. Il a 06personnes en charge.
Mr  fait l’élevage et l’agriculture depuis plus de 04ans. Il s’approvisionne dans les marchés environnants.
Il veut s’acheter   100m de grillage pour son jardin.
Avec ses b bénéfices, il veut ouvrir une boutique. Mr ambitionne assurer la scolarité de ses enfants quand ils auront l’âge d’y aller.
NB : ceci est un crédit complémentaire à son crédit en cours de remboursement.
texts.en:
Sambo Martin is the representative for the Josue Group. A married father, he has two children. The oldest is four years old, and the youngest is 12 months old. Neither of them are currently receiving an education. He has six people living under his care. 

Sambo Martin has been working as a farmer and raising livestock for over four years. He gets his supplies from the local markets. He wants to purchase 100 metres of wire fencing for his garden. He wants to use his profits to open a shop. Sambo Martin hopes to be able to ensure his children's school fees when they come of age.

Note: This is a supplemental loan for the loan he is currently paying back.

loans.use: to purchase 100 metres of wire fencing for their garden

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to pay for her Masters registration fees

loans.name: Neil

texts.en:
Neil is a 49-year-old fisherman from the town of Carles, Iloilo. He is married with two children aged 12 and 13. His wife works as a caregiver. Neil would like to enhance his fishing business to earn more. He is requesting a loan of PHP 20,000 to buy fishing nets and fishing weights. With this, he can be assured of improving his fishing ventures to increase his catch and his income. 

In the future, Neil hopes to make his business a success and continue sending his children to school.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets and fishing weights.

loans.name: Alyn

texts.en:
Alyn is 42 years old, she lives with her husband and four children in Toril, Aloran. Alyn is making a profit through her sari-sari (small grocery) store business. She never gets tired of tending her store. Her passion is selling, and she earns a meager income from it that is adequate enough to support her family. She is a full fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing, without records of default. Now, she has applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items to increase her inventories and sales. 

Alyn continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the determination to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items to increase her inventories and sales.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria, from Concepcion, Iloilo, is a 52-year-old married woman and the mother of four children. She has run a food business from her place, selling home-cooked foods in her food store, for more than 10 years.

Maria is requesting a loan to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, condiments, rice, soft drinks, etc. A loan will enable her to cook and sell more food to her customers. In the future, Maria hopes to make her business sustainable and productive.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients like meat, vegetables, spices, condiments, rice, soft drinks, etc.

loans.name: Julieta

texts.en:
Julieta is 48 years old and lives in Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte. She has a fish selling  business and owns a fishing boat business. Julieta earns approximately PHP 5,000 each month doing this type of work. 

Julieta has been a member of PMPC for three years. She has requested a loan of 50,000 PHP to purchase a fishing boat for her fish selling business.

loans.use: To purchase a fishing boat for her fish selling business.

loans.name: Lorena

texts.en:
Lorena is the 34-year-old mother of four children. Her eldest is 12 and  her youngest is two. She and her husband have been engaged in fishing for the past 13 years. 

A stop was put to Lorena's livelihood when Super Typhoon Haiyan hit their place last year. It has not been easy for her family because their fishing boat was damaged. The cost of buying or building a new one is very expensive and they are struggling. Lorena is requesting a loan of 25,000 PHP to buy a new fishing boat and a motor engine. 

Lorena works hard for her family and hopes that the loan will be a big help to them in the recovery of their business. In the future, she hopes to be successful in sending her children to school.

loans.use: to buy a fishing boat and a motor engine

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to get her business administration degree. It costs a lot and her income isn't enough. With this investment she will make her dream a reality and have more job opportunities.

loans.name: Marcela

texts.en:
Marcela is a widow from Katipunan, Plaridel. She gains a profit from her sari-sari (small grocery) store business. She is a determined business woman who never loses hope in pursuing her goals despite the odds. She never gets tired of tending her store since she has a passion for selling. 

Marcela earns a small income that is sufficient to support her needs. She is a fully fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without record of default. Now, she applied for a loan to purchase additional stock for her sari-sari (small grocery) store to serve more customers and increase her sales.  

Marcela continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the will and the energy to make ends meet for her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock for her sari-sari (small grocery) store.

loans.name: Jadir Antonio

texts.es:
Jadir es un agricultor muy habilidoso con experiencia en varias áreas de la agricultura, con un talento innato para el trabajo en equipo y una gran mente emprendedora.

Tiene un cultivo de papaya que atiende todos los días desde muy tempranas horas de la mañana.

Actualmente vive con su esposa por la cual ha tratado de luchar siempre para sacarla adelante.

Ha tenido varias dificultades con las fuertes lluvias que asedian su cosecha.

El desea darle un impulso a su cultivo y obtener mejores ingresos de este, por eso pide un auxilio económico para invertirlo en insumos agropecuarios y semillas de papaya, el préstamo le dará la oportunidad de tener un producto de mejor calidad.

Su mayor sueño es mejorar su vivienda y tener un mejor cultivo.

Con tu aporte Jadir Podrá progresar en su negocio!
texts.en:
Jadiris a very able farmer with experience in different types of agriculture. He has an innate talent for working in a team and a great enterprising mind. He has a papaya crop that he attends to every day starting very early in the morning. Right now he lives with his wife for whom he has always fought to get ahead. He has had various difficulties with the strong rains that are besieging his harvest. 


He wants to help his crop and obtain better income from it. That is why he is asking for financial help to invest in agricultural materials and papaya seeds. The loan will give him a chance to have a better quality product. His biggest dream is to improve his home and have a better crop. 

With your help, Jadir will be able to progress in his business!

loans.use: to buy agricultural materials and papaya seeds.

loans.name: Eva

texts.es: Eva: Es una mujer amable, tiene 29 años de edad, casada,  tiene 3 hijos, que cursan su primaria. Con el propósito de mejorar su vivienda, solicita financiamiento para reparar las verjas de su vivienda de concreto. Su sueño es construir un pozo perforado para mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en: Eva is a friendly woman. She is 29 years old, married and has 3 children who are in primary school. In order to improve her home she is asking for a loan to repair the gate to her concrete house. Her dream is to build a borewell to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to repair the gate on her house.

loans.name: Blanca Susana

texts.es:
Blanca es una mujer de 20 años soltera que vive con sus padres durante 12 años en el barrio Potrerillos en la Parroquia Belisario Quevedo ciudad de Latacunga provincia de Cotopaxi este barrio es característico por la gente honesta y trabajadora. Por cuestiones económicas ella tan solo pudo culminar sus estudios primarios pero este suceso no le ha impedido salir adelante por eso ella se dedica a la confección de ropa deportiva durante 5 años por esta razón tiene convenios con el Gobierno. Solicita su crédito para comprar una plancha industrial que le ayudará a incrementar sus ganancias y facilitar su trabajo ya que este oficio requiere de muchas horas para obtener un producto de calidad.  
Blanca agradece a FUNDACION ALTERNATIVA y a KIVA por hacer posible cumplir su sueño y salir adelante en la vida.
texts.en:
Blanca, 20, is single. She and her parents have been living for twelve years in Potrerillos, a neighborhood located in a village called Belisario Quevedo in Latacunga, Cotopaxi province. Locals are honest and hardworking people. She had to quit studying after finishing primary school due to financial reasons. However, she could get ahead and has been making sport clothes for five years and has some agreements with the government.

She is requesting a loan to buy an industrial iron. This will help her to increase her profits and will make her work easier. Obtaining a good-quality product requires many hours of work.

Blanca wants to thank Fundación Alternativa and Kiva for helping her to make her dream come true and get ahead.

loans.use: to buy an industrial iron that will help her to make more profits and get ahead.

loans.name: Ma. Chona

texts.en:
Ma. Chona is a 32-year-old woman from Iloilo, Philippines. She is married and has two children aged 8 and 4. Ma. Chona is engaged in retail sales of dried fish and processed goods like sausages and hot dogs. 

Ma. Chona is asking for a loan to buy more dried fish and processed meat like sausages and hot dogs. This loan will enable her improve her stock and sell more to her customers. 

In the future, Ma. Chona hopes to make her business more profitable. She also wants to save extra money in order to support her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy more dried fish and processed meat like sausages and hot dogs.

loans.name: Ma. Teresa

texts.en:
Ma. Teresa is a 34-year-old woman from Carles, Iloilo. She is married with two children aged five and eight. With her husband, she works hard for her family. She is engaged in a sari-sari (variety) store business and also helps in her family's fishing business. She is asking a loan of 25000 PHP to buy fishing nets, biscuits, condiments, shampoo, coffee in sachets, milk, sugar and canned goods. 

Ma. Teresa is determined to look after her business very well and to continue improving so she can provide her children a healthy diet and a proper education.

loans.use: to buy fishing nets, biscuits, condiments, shampoo, coffee in sachets, milk, sugar and canned goods

loans.name: Floripes

texts.en:
Floripes is managing her sari-sari store business in Sindangan. She mastered the business when she and her husband were in the early years of their marriage. The business has been doing well, supporting the needs of the family. She has local customers and recently, she decided to venture into a coffee selling business for added income. 

She borrowed an amount to purchase more coffee beans, cups, and electric hot pots for her coffee business. 

She wants to expand her business, and would be even happier to open a small canteen at a nearby school.

loans.use: to purchase more coffee beans, cups, and electric hot pots

location.town: Sindangan - Doña Josefa, Sindangan, Zamboanga del

loans.name: Delia

texts.en:
Delia is 50 years old and lives in Goleo, Sindangan, Zambo. Del Norte. She is engaged in a transportation business as a van operator; together with her husband who has been an auto mechanic for 15 years already, and earns approximately PHP 4,000 each month doing this type of business activity. 

She has requested a loan to purchase mechanical parts for their van for repair. 

Delia has been a member of PMPC for eight years. In the future, Delia hopes to expand their radiator repair shop business.

loans.use: to purchase auto parts for repair

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is thankful that she was granted a 15,000 PHP loan which she used to purchase various grocery items and products needed in her general store. Through her earnings she is able to send her children to school and meet their daily living expense. 

She would now like to apply for a 17,000 PHP loan which she will use as part of her working capital to buy more quantities of grocery items like rice, coffee, soda, noodles, toiletries and other products which she sells at retail. She knows that more items in her store will yield more sales and thus increase her earnings. Her income from her store is a stable source to sustain her family's basic needs, and for the education of her children. She is thanking God and you in advance for the financial help that will be given her. 

Dolores dreams of having a grocery store, and aims to give her children the best education so they will have a better future. Every week, she meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of her work and to draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God which she studies .

 *All Center for Community Transformation (CCT) community partners/clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital and repay microfinance loans.

loans.use: to buy grocery items, toiletries, and beverages

loans.name: Felizardo

texts.en:
Felizardo is 60 years old.  Felizardo personally sells the catch from their fishing boat in nearby municipalities. Since he became a member of Paglaum MPC, he has been a member in good standing for almost three years. 

He wants to obtain financial assistance from Paglaum MPC amounting to Php 30,000 for the purchase of new nets and fishing equipment.  

As much as possible, they have to have all the needed fishing accessories to minimize chances of a low or zero catch.  He already has floaters to help guard their fish cages. He also wants to buy the fish catch of his neighbors, so he can sell more fish at the nearby fish market, where they will fetch higher prices.  

In the future, he dreams of purchasing a new fishing boat by setting aside some savings from the daily sales.  He wishes to see his children have stable jobs, as well.

loans.use: to purchase new nets and fishing equipment

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock to sell like canned goods, noodles, soda and beverages, rice, biscuits and bread, soap and toiletries, and condiments

loans.name: Rayzen

texts.en:
Rayzen used her previous loans for her school expenses. Rayzen studied at one of the universities in Ozamiz City. 

Rayzen is very dedicated to her studies, and gets lots of support from her parents, of course. She hopes to finish her studies and find a job in the near future. 

She took another loan recently to pay her tuition fees for the second semester.

loans.use: to pay her tuition fees for the second semester.

loans.name: Imelda

texts.en:
Imelda is a 60-year-old married woman, and a mother of four grown up children from Concepcion, Iloilo. She makes a living through her retail store business. Imelda sells various types of goods and food items to the people in her place.

Imelda is asking for a loan to buy more merchandise to sell, like canned goods, soft drinks and beverages, rice, noodles, bread and biscuits, soap and detergents, toiletries and condiments.This loan will help her improve her stock, thus attracting more buyers in her store.

In the future, Imelda hopes to expand her store and cater to more customers.

loans.use: to buy more merchandise to sell like canned goods, soft drinks and beverages, rice, noodles, bread and biscuits, soap and detergents, toiletries and condiments

loans.name: Lucel

texts.en:
Lucel, 31 years old, lives in Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occidental. She is married, with three kids. In order to survive, she has found ways to attain income through her sari-sari (small grocery) store. It began with displaying a few inventories of canned goods, noodles, sugar, and a dozen of shampoo and soap. 

She joined Paglaum Cooperative, which helped her in the capitalization of her sari-sari (small grocery) store in May of 2012. She became a MIGS member, which is why she has received loans several times already. 

Now she applies for 20,000 PHP to pay for additional merchandise to draw more customers to buy in her sari-sari store. 

She hopes that her business will continue, and someday become a mini-grocery.

loans.use: to pay for additional merchandise to draw more customers to buy in her sari-sari store

location.town: Plaridel-Upper Puntod, Lopez Jaena, Misamis Occide

loans.name: Melitona

texts.en:
Melitona has started her small time business, and became a boss, with her sari-sari store. She has manage to have enough inventory, and rolls up her capital to gain more profit. Everyday she makes good sales since she is the only store in their barangay. 

Recently she approached Paglaum for much needed capital to restock her store with basic commodities. 

In the future, she hopes to have a decent home for the family.

loans.use: to restock the store with basic commodities like canned goods, oil, and soy sauce

loans.name: Jonathan David

texts.es:
Jonathan, es un joven de 19 años de edad que desde hace 4 años se ha dedicado a diversas actividades laborales, hoy en día se gana la vida y obtiene algunos ingresos con la venta de mercancía a través de catalogo.

Este joven se caracteriza por ser muy emprendedor, trabajador, con visión y con muchas ganas de salir adelante, es por esta razón que se anima a solicitar un crédito, para invertirlo en la compra de surtido de cremas, lociones y demás productos de uso personal con el fin de darle un impulso a su negocio, que logre atraer más clientes y de este modo ofrecerles una variedad de productos que satisfagan sus necesidades y gustos, de esta manera logrará obtener más ingresos para continuar aportando a la economía de su hogar y ahorrar para conseguir un local comercial.

Su mayor sueño es poder salir adelante, mejorar sus ventas y poder tener un buen futuro gracias a sus esfuerzos.

Apoya a Jonathan a realizar sus sueños!
texts.en:
Jonathan is a young 19 year old who for the past four years has worked in diverse activities.  Today he earns his living selling merchandise via catalog.  

This young man is very entrepreneurial, hard-working, and with a vision and a great desire to get ahead.  For this reason he is requesting a loan, in order to invest in the purchase of a range of cremes, lotions, and other products for personal care with the aim of helping his business grow.  This will help him attract more customers and offer them a variety of products that will satisfy their needs and preferences.  In this way he will obtain more income in order to continue supporting his household economically and so he can save in order to set up his own store. 

His greatest dream is to get ahead, to increase his sales, and to be able to have a good future thanks to his efforts. 

Support Jonathan and help him realize his dreams!

loans.use: To purchase a range of cremes, lotions, and other products for personal care.

loans.name: Leonila

texts.en:
Leonila is 45 years old, she is married, and lives in Katipunan, Plaridel. Leonila thought she was in the right place when she joined the microfinance group of Paglaum MPC. She decided to take on a hog raising business after she learned she can avail financial assistance for her chosen business. Leonila has maintained her membership in good standing, without records of default up to this day. 

She has taken several loans, and all were paid in a timely manner. 

Recently she availed a loan to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for her growing hogs. This will help her hog raising income with a big boost. 

Leonila wishes to continuously manage her business more effectively so that she can provide a better living and a good education to her children.

loans.use: to purchase bags of feed and animal vitamins for her growing hogs

loans.name: Ivy

texts.en:
Ivy is driven by motivation in selling. At the age of 31, a mother in Puntod, Lopez, Jaena is operating a store that primarily supports their family. Everyday she is tending her store. 

Ivy is a full fledged member of PMPC, and has took several loans already. She religiously paid her obligations without records of delinquency. 

Now she borrowed another loan to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, noodles and soft drinks to get more stock to sell and generate a higher income. Having enough inventory would mean income opportunities for her to pay for land rental each month. 

In the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, noodles and soft drinks

loans.name: Dennis

texts.en:
Dennis is a habal-habal or motorcycle transport driver from Iloilo, Philippines. He is 40 years old, and has been in the business for more than 20 years now. Dennis also earns an additional income through fish vending. 

Dennis needs additional capital for the business. He is requesting to take a loan to pay for the repair and maintenance of the motorcycle, and additional capital for fish vending.

With a loan, Dennis will be able to improve his way of living and income.

loans.use: to pay for the repair and maintenance of the motorcycle, and additional capital for fish vending

loans.name: Amelita

texts.en:
Amelita is driven by passion in selling. At the age of 64, married and from Sindangan ZN., she runs a store that primarily supports their family. Everyday she never get tired of tending her store. 

Amelita is a full fledged member of PMPC, and has took several loans already. She religiously paid her obligations without records of default. 

Now, she borrowed another loan to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, and noodles to sell. Having enough inventories would mean income opportunities.

In the future, she dreams of sustaining her store to continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to pay for inventories of sugar, milk, oil, noodles

loans.name: Jevie

texts.en:
Jevie is from Brangay Disud, Sindangan, ZN. He is 24 years old, and is married. Jevie owns and operates a general merchandise business, operating a specialized retail store selling umbrellas, bolo, water tubs, basins, etc. in the local community. He has been engaged in his business for over six years and earns approximately 3,000 PHP a month. 

Jevie joined PMPC to gain access to financial services to help improve his living situation and his ability to engage in business activities. He has successfully repaid a previous loan from PMPC. 

Jevie is requesting a new loan used to purchase additional inventory and to use as working capital. This loan will be his 1st loan from PMPC. 

He plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to improve the general living conditions of his family.

loans.use: to purchase additional inventories of general merchandise

location.town: Sindangan - Disud, Sindangan, Zamboanga del Norte

loans.name: Maria Gina

texts.en:
Maria Gina lives in Ozamiz City, Misamis Occidental, is 48 years old, and married, with two children. She has a carinderia business where she can support and sustain the needs of her family. However due to the needs to pay for the tuition fee of her two children, she borrows money amounting to Php 15,000. 

The money she borrows from PMPC will help her children to continue in school.

loans.use: To pay for the tuition fee of her children

loans.name: Carlos Armando

texts.es:
Carlos es un humilde trabajador residente en el municipio de El Carmen De Viboral con una vida colmada de sueños, esperanzas y los mejores deseos para su familia. Es padre de 7 hijos por los cuales siempre tuvo el valor y responsabilidad de responder para que su vida fuera la mejor.

Hoy en día se gana la vida con la elaboración y venta de alimentos a base de coco, estos alimentos los transporta en una carretilla y los vende de manera ambulante.

De las principales dificultades que debe enfrentar en su trabajo son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de las materias primas.

Solicita un préstamo para la compra de materias primas como coco y leche al por mayor para tener una muy buen producción en esta temporada de fin de año, así podrá tener los ingresos suficientes para continuar con su negocio y sostener a su familia.
texts.en:
Carlos is a humble worker who resides in the city of El Carmen de Viboral.  His life is full of dreams, hopes and the best desires for his family.  He is the father of 7 children for whom he has always had value and responsibility to respond in order to make their lives better.  

Currently he earns his living by making and selling food items from coconut.  These foods he transports in a cart and sells as a walking salesman. 

Some of the main difficulties that he faces in his work are strong rains and the high cost of raw materials.

He is asking for a loan in order to purchase raw materials such as coconut and milk in bulk in order to have a better production this Christmas and New Year's season.  This will allow him to have sufficient income to continue his business and support his family.

loans.use: to purchase raw materials such as coconut and milk in bulk

loans.name: John Edgar

texts.es:
John es un hombre con gran empuje y emprendimiento, desde hace 2 años inicio con un negocio que hoy en día le permite ser independiente y emprendedor, esta actividad se trata de un bar que un ubico en un local en el municipio de Bello.

Es un negocio bastante popular en el sector y se ha convertido en punto de encuentro para jóvenes y adultos.

Con tan poco tiempo en el mercado ya tiene cierto nivel de reconocimiento gracias a la buena gestión de John.

El solicita un préstamo para realizar la compra de un televisor y desea comprar surtido de bebidas, licores y frituras para aumentar sus ventas.
Trabaja solo todos los días intentando cumplir su sueño de heredar el negocio a sus hijos y mejorar las condiciones de su vivienda.

Impacta la vida de John con un préstamo hoy!
texts.en:
John is a man of great initiative and dedication. Two years ago he started a business that nowadays allows him to be independent and enterprising.

His business is a bar located in the city of Bello. It is a popular bar in the area and it has become a meeting place for young people and adults. Within a short time in business, it already enjoys recognition thanks to John's good management.

He is requesting a loan to buy a TV as well as an assortment of drinks, liquor, and fried snacks, to increase his sales. 

He works alone every day to reach his dream of leaving this business as legacy to his children, as well as improving his housing conditions.

You can help John with a loan today.

loans.use: to buy a TV and an assortment of drinks.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a wind instrument called a tuba.

loans.name: Adia

texts.fr: Mariée et maman de 04 enfants, Adia est âgée de 37. Elle vit avec sa famille dans le quartier Adidomé. Adia a débuté le commerce des produits de beauté depuis 2003. A cause de la mévente, elle a entamé la commercialisation des pagnes et draps.Adia est très déterminée à réussir son commerce pour gagner du profit et augmenter son fonds de roulement. Pour cela, elle parcourt les quartiers et les marchés à la criée. Elle consacre à son activité plus de 5h de temps par jour. Elle s’approvisionne 03 fois par mois.Pour augmenter son stock et réduire les coûts de transport, Adia souhaite avoir un crédit pour acheter 03 pagnes traditionnels connus sous le nom « LOKPO » et des draps.
texts.en: Married and the mother of four children, Adia is 37 years old. She lives with her family in the Adidomé neighborhood. Adia began selling beauty products in 2003. Due to the a slump in sales, she diversified and began selling traditional cloths and sheets. Adia is very determined to succeed her business qctivity in order to gain profits to increase her working assets. In order to do so, she spends a lot of time strolling the neighborhoods and markets by calling out her products. She spend more than 5 hours per day on this activity. She stocks up 3 times a month. In order to increase her stock and reduce transport costs, Adia is asking for a loan to purchase three traditional cloths known as 'LOKPO' and sheets.

loans.use: purchase three units of traditional cloths and two units of sheets

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy products for pending orders.  These earnings will allow her to finish her education and improve herself.

loans.name: Dora Elena

texts.es:
Dora cuenta con una experiencia de 20 años en la actividad de la confección, tiene su taller de confección a terceros en su casa desde hace 18 años. 

Trabaja durante todo el día y con su taller genera 1 empleo a una persona con muchas necesidades. Esta actividad la aprendió a través de capacitaciones constantes. 

La ventaja es que ya tiene reconocimiento en el sector y la producción es muy buena, lo que le ha permitido cada vez conseguir más clientes para su negocio y también se ha transformado en grandes pedidos. 

Debido a que en la actualidad su capacidad de producción no alcanza para satisfacer a todos sus clientes, Dora requiere de un préstamo para comprar una máquina fileteadora e insumos de confección para aumentar la capacidad de producción de su negocio.

Su mayor anhelo es salir adelante con su taller de confección y poder tener en su hogar unas mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar junto a su esposo y sus 2 hijos.

Con tu ayuda Dora podrá salir adelante!
texts.en:
Dora has 20 years of experience in sewing.  She has had her tailor shop in her house for 18 years; she works with third parties.  She works all day, and she employs one person who is very needy.  She learned this work through ongoing training.

The advantage Dora has is that she's already known in the field and her production is very good, which has allowed her to attract more customers all the time for her business.  It also has turned into large orders.

Currently her production capacity isn't big enough to satisfy all her customers.  Dora needs a loan to buy a serger and sewing supplies so she can increase the production capacity of her business.

Her biggest desire is to get ahead with her tailor shop and be able to have better financial opportunities in her household.  That way she and her husband and her two children can make progress.

Dora will be able to get ahead with your help!

loans.use: to buy a serger and sewing supplies

loans.name: Céline

texts.fr:
Céline a 32 ans et vit dans le quartier Adakpamé. Elle est mariée et mère d’un enfant.
Céline est coiffeuse depuis 2004. Pour mieux satisfaire ses clients,  elle a associé à son activité le commerce des pagnes et produits de beauté. Afin d’augmenter son stock, Céline sollicite un microcrédit pour acheter 04 pièces de pagne et des mèches.Les revenus pourront lui permettre d’augmenter son fonds de roulement et participer du bien-être de sa famille.
texts.en: Céline is 32 yearz old and lives in the Adakpamé neighborhood. She is married and the mother of one child. She has been a hairdresser since 2004. To better satisy for her clients, she also sells traditional cloths and beauty products. In order to increase her stock, Céline is asking for a microloan to purchase 4 traditional cloths and 55 hair extensions. The revenues from these sales would enable her to increase her working capital and allow her to participate in the well being of her family.

loans.use: purchase four traditional cloths and 55 units of hair extensions.

loans.name: Rosina

texts.es:
Resina es una emprendedora, comprometida con el trabajo, muy alegre y luchadora que encontró en su tienda de cosméticos, dulces, caramelos, empaques de papas etc.
Rosina es madre de 3 hijos de 14, 11, 7 años de edad su deseo es darles estudio a ellos, sabe que es muy humilde pero trabaja diariamente para que ellos puedan asistir a una escuela.
Agradece a un amigo quien le enseño esta forma de vida pues no encontraba una manera de generar ingresos.
Rosina visualiza su negocio en 5 años abriendo su  primer local, pagando las cuotas de su casa propia que quiere, por ello quiere solicitar un crédito que invertirá en la compra de una vitrina, ropa para niño y adolescentes, y variedad en cosméticos y productos de belleza.
texts.en:
Rosina is an entrepreneur committed to her work. She is very happy and a fighter who is found in her store selling cosmetics, sweets, caramels, packs of chips, etc. Rosina is the mother of 3 children, aged 14, 11 and 7 years old. She wants to provide them with education. She knows it is very humble but she works every day so that they can go to a school.

She is grateful to a friend who showed her this form of life as she couldn't find a means to generate income. Rosina visualizes her business in 5 years, opening her first store, paying the installments on the house that she wants. For this reason she is requesting a loan a loan to invest in the purchase of a display case, clothing for children and youth and a variety of cosmetics and beauty products.

loans.use: to buy a display case and a stock of clothing for children and youth and a variety of cosmetics.

loans.name: Luis Carlos

texts.es:
Luis un hombre de 43 años de edad, que en el año 2004 logro algo muy importante y fue montar su propio negocio, un proyecto que gracias a sus padres pudo realizar. 
Luis tiene un negocio de distribución autorizado de cerveza, surtiendo a tiendas y bares locales a un costo moderado y accesible para ellos. 
Buscando sostener su negocio y ser más agresivo frente a la competencia, ya que quiere captar clientes, mejorar e incrementar las ventas y utilidad quiere solicitar un crédito que invertirá en surtido de cerveza.
Este trabajador hombre que durante los 7 días a la semana trabaja 8 horas cada uno quiere darle la mejor calidad de vida posible a sus dos hijos que son menores de edad.
texts.en:
Luis, age 43, achieved something very important in the year 2004.  He established his own business, a project that he was able to complete thanks to his parents.

Luis has a business being an authorized beer distributor.  He supplies stores and local bars at a moderate price that is affordable for them.

He is looking to sustain his business and to be more aggressive facing the competition.  He wants to get new customers and improve and increase sales and profitability.  He wants to request a loan to stock up on beer.

This hard-working man, who works seven days a week, eight hours a day, wants to give the best quality of life possible to his two minor children.

loans.use: to stock up on beer that he supplies to local and rural stores.

loans.name: Akouwa

texts.fr:
Akouwa est âgée de 36 ans. Elle a 3 enfants et habite dans le quartier Attiégou. 
Akouwa vend du sel, de la farine de manioc  et du maïs. Elle s’approvisionne aux marchés de Vogan et Akodessewa auprès des grossistes. Faute de fonds de roulement important, elle s’y rend toutes les 2 semaines.Akouwa sollicite un crédit pour augmenter les stocks de ses produits et réduire les coûts de transports.
texts.en: Akouwa is 36 years old. She is the mother of three children and lives in the Attiégou neighborhood. Akouwa sells salt, manioc flour and corn; She stocks up at the Vogan and Akodessewa markets from wholesale vendors. Due to a lack of working capital, she returns every two weeks to stock up. Akouwa is asking for a loan in order to increase her product stock and reduce transport costs.

loans.use: purchase five bags of salt, three bags of manioc flour and two bags of corn

loans.name: Jose Edward

texts.es:
Jose Edward tiene 36 años de edad, vive junto a su cónyuge y sus menores hijos en su casa de material rústico, cuenta con servicio básico de agua, ubicada en el caserío de Miraflores una zona de relieve accidentado donde su población se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de café, frutales y crianza de animales a 30 minutos del Distrito de Santo Tomás que pertenece a la Provincia de Cutervo, Región Cajamarca, ubicado en la parte norte del Perú.

Jose Edward se dedica a la agricultura especialmente al cultivo de cafeto de la variedad Catimor, tiene una familia unida, su cónyuge le apoya con los gastos para su familia dedicandose a la crianza de animales menores como patos y gallinas. Jose Edward es un padre emprendedor que se esfuerza por darle una mejor calidad de vida a su familia, anteriormente solicito un prestamo a Edpyme Alternativa para darle mantenimiento a su cultivo mediante la deshierba. Actualmente ha solicitado un préstamo de 3000 nuevos soles para invertirlo en la compra de fertilizantes para su cultivo de café y pago a jornaleros que le apoyan en esta labor y de esta manera tener una mejor producción que le permitira tener mayores ingresos para su familia.
texts.en:
Jose Edward is 36 years old and lives with his spouse and his minor children in his own house made of rustic materials which has basic water services. He lives in the village of Miraflores, a mountainous area where the inhabitants work in agriculture, especially growing coffee, fruit and raising animals. It is 30 minutes from the district of .Santo Tomás, which belongs to Cutervo province, Cajamarca region, located in the north of Peru.

Jose Edward works in agriculture, specifically growing the Catimor varietal of coffee. He has a close family. His wife works raising small animals like chickens and ducks to help with the family's expenses. Jose Edward is an enterprising father who makes an effort to provide his family with the best quality of living.

Previously he requested a loan from Edpyme Alternativa to maintain his crops by clearing the undergrowth. Now he has requested a loan of 3000 PEN to invest in the purchase of fertilizers for his coffee crops and to pay day labor to help him with his labor. In this way he will have better production which will allow him greater income for his family.

loans.use: to invest in buying fertilizer for his coffee crops and pay day labor to help him with the work.

loans.name: Sandra Maria

texts.es:
Sandra desde muy temprana edad aprendió el oficio de confección de ropa gracias a su mamá que toda su vida fue confeccionista y fue así como poco a poco Sandra empezó a entender y aplicar estos conocimientos.

Es soltera y se gana la vida con la fabricación de prendas de vestir en una pequeña maquina de confección que tiene en su casa. Se siente muy agradecida con todo lo que ha podido construir hasta ahora.

Ella pide un apoyo económico para comprar insumos para la elaboración de ropa y así poder aumentar su volumen de producción.

Una de sus mas grandes dificultades es el alto costo de los insumos para trabajar y la competencia que se presenta en el sector.

Tiene muchas esperanzas en su negocio y conserva la ilusión de tener un taller mucho más grande y prospero para subsistir.

Apoya a Sandra con un préstamo y haz que su negocio crezca cada día más!
texts.en:
Sandra learned the trade of making clothing at a very young age thanks to her mother, a lifelong tailor.  Little by little Sandra began to understand and apply her knowledge.

She's single and earns a living making garments on a small sewing machine in her home.  She's very grateful for everything she has been able to do thus far.

Sandra's requesting some financial help to buy supplies to make clothing so she can increase her production.

One of her biggest difficulties is the high cost of supplies for work and the competition in the field.  She has a lot of expectations for her business, and she hopes to have a much bigger and more prosperous shop to subsist on.

Help Sandra with a loan and help her business grow more all the time!

loans.use: to buy materials to make clothing

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a freezer to preserve the food she sells.

loans.name: Betty

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Betty, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Turbo, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de alimentos variados como almuerzos y desayunos en un pequeño restaurante ubicado en su propia casa.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su restaurante porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Betty ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, por esta razón acude a un préstamo para comprar insumos e ingredientes para la preparación de sus recetas.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio que son dos de sus mayores sueños.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Betty is hard-working and humble.  She is a warrior woman who has devoted a big part of her life to caring for her children.  She lives in the Turbo municipality, where she earns a living preparing various meals like lunches and breakfasts.  She does this at a small restaurant at her house.  Her food is well-known by her neighbors, who visit her restaurant because they know that they will be able to eat delicious food.

Betty has decided to improve her business and increase her sales.  That is the reason she turns to a loan to buy supplies and ingredients to prepare her recipes.

This loan will allow her to get ahead in her business.  This way she will get the needed income that will give her the opportunity to continue supporting her family and sustaining her business.  These are her two greatest dreams.

Help this woman with a loan and make her dreams a reality.

loans.use: to buy supplies and ingredients to prepare her recipes.

loans.name: Villadel Antonio

texts.es:
Villadel un humilde agricultor que cada mañana sale a trabajar en su campo y dedicado de lleno al trabajo, solo piensa en progresar y entregar un buen producto, pues sabe que muchas personas consumen y prefieren sus alimentos y por ello es que cada gota de sudor que sale de su frente es el empeño que pone para que su productos salgan puros y de calidad.

Como un preocupado agricultor quiere siempre implementar arreglos y mejoras para optimizar sus cultivos, pero sabe que estos arreglos o implementaciones son muy costosos y por esta razón solicita un crédito para comprar insumos como abonos y riegos con los cuales podrá tener uno cultivos en perfectos estado para la cosecha y Consumo.

Una de sus mayores dificultades son las fuertes lluvias y el alto costo de los insumos.

Apoya a Villadel para que sus cultivos tengan una gran oportunidad de salir adelante!
texts.en:
Villadel is a humble farmer who each day goes out to work in his fields. He is completely dedicated to his work and only thinks of progressing and harvesting a good product. He knows that a lot of people prefer and consume his foods which are pure and of good quality.

Like any concerned farmer he always wants to implement adaptions and improvements to optimize his crops. But he knows that these adjustments and implementations are very costly. So he is requesting a loan to buy supplies like manure and irrigation with which he can have his crops in perfect condition for harvest and consumption. One of his main problems is the heavy rains and the high cost of supplies.

Support Villadel so that his crops have the opportunity to get ahead.

loans.use: to buy supplies like manure and irrigation.

loans.name: Aminatou

texts.fr: Aminatou est née en 1967. Elle est veuve et vit à Tokoin CEBEVITO. Elle s’occupe seule de ses 04 enfants qui vont encore à l’école.Elle commercialise  près de l’hôpital de Lomé, les couches et habits pour bébé et enfants, des produits désinfectants et  serviettes hygiénique.Afin d’augmenter son fonds de roulement, Amination sollicite un crédit pour acheter 8 douzaines d’habit enfant, 5 paquets de couches pour bébé, 2 paquets de serviettes hygiéniques, 04 cartons de produits antiseptiques.Les bénéfices lui permettront et d’assurer le bien-être de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Aminatou was born in 1967. She is a widow and lives in Tokoin Cebevito. She is the sole provider for her 4 children who still attend school.

Aminatou is in business near the hospital in Lomé, selling diapers and clothing for babies and children, as well as disinfecting products and sanitary napkins. In order to increase her business funds, she is requesting a loan to purchase 8 dozen articles of children's clothing, 5 packages of diapers, 2 packages of sanitary napkins, and 4 boxes of disinfecting products. 

The proceeds from this loan will allow Aminatou to ensure the well-being of her children.

loans.use: to purchase 8 dozen articles of children's clothing, 5 packages of diapers, 4 boxes of disinfectant, and 2 packages of sanitary napkins

loans.name: Martha Cecilia

texts.es:
Martha es una humilde mujer de 52 años de edad que vio en su cocina un potencial enorme para crear una empresa y generar sus propios recursos y no depender de su esposo ya que no sabe que día este pueda faltar.
Todos sus conocimientos de cocina los aprendió gracias a su madre quien le enseño este arte y a través de un crédito quiere solventar sus problemas financieros ya que no tiene suficiente capital para comprar los insumos y materia prima que necesita.
Buscando mejorar su vida, realizar mejoras a la casa y crecer, solicita un crédito que invertirá en la compra de alimentos como frutas, verduras, carne, granos etc. también en la compra de empaques y solo tiene una meta vender y vender para que su vida sea más tranquila.
texts.en:
Martha, 52, is a modest woman.  She saw the huge potential of her cooking as a way to create a business, earn her own income, and not be dependent on her husband, because she doesn't know when he could be short.  She learned all her cooking knowledge thanks to her mother, who taught her the art.

Martha's trying to resolve her financial problems with a loan, because she doesn't have enough capital to buy the supplies and ingredients she needs.  She's hoping to improve her life, make improvements to her house, and grow, so she's requesting a loan to buy fruits and vegetables, meat, grains, and other food.  She's also going to buy packaging.

She has only one objective: to sell and sell so her life will be more peaceful.

loans.use: to buy food such as fruits and vegetables, meat, and grains.  She's an older woman who's trying to feel useful in her household

loans.name: Chita

texts.en: Chita is 43 years old. She lives with her husband and two school-age children in Lopez Jaena, Philippines. Chita's husband is a minimum-wage earner. Chita applied for a loan to Paglaum Multi-Purpose Cooperative, of which she became a full-fledged member in 2014, amounting to 12,000 PHP to purchase additional materials to complete her house. Chita wishes for nothing more than to provide her family with a decent and comfortable place to live.

loans.use: to purchase additional materials to complete her house.

loans.name: Manuela

texts.es:
Mujer emprendedora de 49 años de edad residente en Suchitepéquez  casada, ella tiene 3 hijos de  los cuales se dedican a estudiar en la escuela de la comunidad donde viven,  ella tiene que realizar un esfuerzo enorme para poder mantener a su familia y ver la forma de cómo mejorar el sistema económica de ello.

El actividad que realiza es la fabricación de güipiles, cortes y fajas típicas y los pone a la venta en la comunidad donde ella vive ya que para ella es una fuente importante de ingreso para su familia, para poder mejorar las condiciones de vida que actualmente viven  en su comunidad, ella realiza una segunda actividad que es la venta de granizadas, ella siempre trata la forma de cómo tener un ingreso económico extra para poder darle a sus hijos el estudio que se merecen y que algún día llega a ser un profesional en la vida.

El uso respectivo que le dará al préstamo que ella está realizando es para la compra de hilos para la elaboración de güipiles, cortes y fajas típicas para luego venderlas en su comunidad y vecinos para tener un mejor ingreso económico  para ella y su familia.

Una de sus metas futuras es la compra de un local en su comunidad para que ella pueda realizar la venta de su mercadería y ver crecer a sus hijos en la escuela y llegar a ser  profesional en la vida y que tenga una condición de vida mejor.
texts.en:
An enterprising 49-year-old woman who lives in Suchitepéquez, she is married and has three children who spend their time studying in the community school where they live.  She must make an enormous effort to maintain her family and find a way to improve the household finances.  

Her business is the production of traditional blouses, skirts and belts, which she sells in her community.  This is an important source of income for her family, which allows her to improve the current living conditions of her community.  She also has a second business selling snow cones. She is always trying to find a way to have additional income to give her children the education they deserve so they can one day be professionals.  

She will use this loan to buy the thread for the production of the traditional blouses, skirts and belts so that she can sell them to her neighbors and community and have more income for herself and her family.  One of her future goals is to buy a shop in her community to be able to sell her merchandise, watch her children grow at school and one day be professionals who have better living conditions.

loans.use: to buy thread to make traditional clothing

loans.name: Maria Dolly

texts.es:
María llego a interactuar con un sueño, con una esperanza, hacer que su negocio crezca, María es una vendedora de alimentos que ella misma elabora en la cocina de su casa, donde quizás no tiene todos los implementos pero es un lugar muy aseado y muy del gusto de sus clientes.
Aprendió a cocinar gracias a una amiga y ahora se encuentra solicitando un crédito para mejorar sus ventas y número de clientes, por ello interactuar  no solo le hará un desembolso si no que le hará un acompañamiento.
Con el crédito compra un carro de comidas y surtido de alimentos.
texts.en:
María went to Interactuar with a dream, a hope: to make her business grow.

María sells food that she herself makes in the kitchen of her home.  She may not have all the utensils, but it's a very clean place and very much to her customers' taste.  She learned to cook thanks to a friend.

Currently María's requesting a loan to improve her sales and acquire more customers.  Interactuar will give her not only a loan but also follow-up.  She'll buy a food cart and a supply of food with the loan.

loans.use: to buy a food cart to sell hot dogs, hamburgers, and potatoes on the weekend

loans.name: Maa Santoshi Shg Group

texts.en:
Smitanjali is a 24-year-old divorced lady who hails from a very small village of Ostapal of Dhenkanal district, Odisha, India. Smitanjali is the president of  Maa Santoshi SHG, which consists of nine members. Generally, all the ladies work hard and are busy all the day doing their household chores, but in their free time they used to gossip and pass time. Then Smitanjali thought of forming a group and getting sustainable training through which they could use their free time usefully and also earn some money out of it. Many ladies rejected her idea, but some of the women supported her and formed a SHG (Self Help Group). They decided to get training to make cement vases and idols from their fellow villagers who are already in this work.

Hearing this, all the SHG ladies were reluctant to get the training from men because of social barriers, and even their husbands were against this idea. But Smitanjali made it possible; even in this topsy-turvy situation, she alone took the training and became the master trainer for her SHG members.

Still, they couldn't start their work because they needed some investment to buy raw materials, and they hesitated to ask for help from their husbands because they were already against their idea. And then, one of the Peoples Forum staff went to their village, and with his help, the Maa Santoshi group could get a loan to invest in their innovation.

Earlier, all the villagers were teasing them, but gradually they admired their work and supported them. Smitanjali was amazed to see that because she just thought of doing something new or creative apart from their daily household chores. Moreover, the members gained confidence and gave more and more time in the quality and innovative creation of the work.

Their goodwill spread to the nearby districts and villages. More and more demand increased for their products; moreover, the dealers paid them well, and they made a pretty good profit out of their pieces of art.

They got encouraged day by day, and took skill development training, through which they learned fusion art. According to the market demand, it helped them to create innovative and quality art products.

Earlier, all the nine members of Maa Santoshi SHG were just simple, shy homemakers, but by the leadership and confidence of Smitanjali, all are now skilled artisans and confident entrepreneurs.

Smitanjali will use her portion to buy cement, colors in bulk and new tools so that she can make more products and can gain more profit.

loans.use: to buy cement, colors in bulk and new tools

loans.name: Maa Tarini Shg (D) Group

texts.en:
Goura is 30 years old, and she is married with two children. Goura is the group leader of the Maa Tarini (D) Shg, which consists of nine members. 

Goura works in agriculture, raising poultry. Goura has been involved in this business for five years. She is a very hardworking woman, as she works from 6 a.m. to 8 p.m. daily to care for her poultry business. She is requesting a loan to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

In 2013, Goura joined Peoples Forum through her group to improve her business. This will be her first loan cycle with Peoples Forum. 

With her business profit, Goura hopes for her family to be healthy and happy, for her business to do well, and for her children to get admission into a good school.

loans.use: to purchase baby poultry to raise and sell in the future.

loans.name: Samuel Shg Group

texts.en:
Samuel Shg group is made up of nine hardworking women from a small village of Koraput district of Odisha, India, who joined in order to fulfill their dreams by helping each other. Najarita is the president of this group. All the group members are engaged in different activities, such as milk selling, vegetables selling, etc.

Najarita is a 34-year-old married women with two children who go to school. She started her small grocery store four years ago, selling various goods, such as soap, salt, sugar, and biscuits. She is requesting this loan to buy assorted items in bulk, in order to satisfy her customers' needs. Her plan is to use any profits generated to start constructing a building for her grocery business, and to pay school fees for her children.

loans.use: to buy assorted groceries

loans.name: Betty

texts.en:
Betty is a businesswoman from Southern Looc, Plaridel. She is 49 years old, married and has the expertise in selling. She runs a little sari-sari store and earns a meager income that is adequate enough to support her family. 

Betty is a full-fledged member of PMPC and has taken several loans already. She maintains her membership in good standing without records of default. Now, she applied for a loan to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items. Betty continues to look for better business opportunities, proof that she has the passion and the energy to successfully face all the challenges with courage for her family.

loans.use: to restock her store with basic commodities and other consumable items

loans.name: Guada

texts.en:
Guada is a 38-year-old married woman and a mother of four children from Concepcion, Iloilo, Philippines. She and her husband run a business making garden sets such as tables, chairs, flower vases, pots and urns, which they sell to customers who want to beautify their gardens. This business has been their source of income for the past six years.

Guada is asking for a loan to buy cement, sand, paints and other materials for their business. This loan will help Guada and her husband make more garden sets. In the future, Guada dreams of sustaining their business and making it more profitable. She also wants to save money for her children's schooling.

loans.use: to buy cement, sand, paints and other materials for landscaping accessories business.

loans.name: Rosita

texts.en:
Rosita is a hardworking mother from Plaridel. 

She owns and manages a coconut meat milling service business. She only accepts shelled coconuts for the service offered. Rosita has signed her membership with the cooperative to gain access to insurances and financial assistance. 

She applied for a loan to buy additional materials and equipment to improve her business and able to cater more customers. 

Rosita hopes to succeed in this business and continuously provide for her family.

loans.use: to buy additional materials and equipment to improve her business and be able to cater more customers.

loans.name: Arlyn

texts.en:
Arlyn is a 29-year-old  married woman with one child who operates a grocery store to earn a living. She is eager to have a profitable store and earn more income.  

She requests a new loan  to purchase additional grocery items and livestock feed.  She plans to use the additional revenue generated from the business to renovate her house for a safer and more comfortable living with her family.

loans.use: to purchase additional grocery items and livestock feed.

loans.name: Lolita

texts.en:
Lolita is 52 years old, married and a resident of Sto.Nino, Dapitan City, Zamboanga del Norte.

She earns a living through her sari-sari store. She has been a member of PMPC for 8 years and enjoys the privileges of being a member of the Cooperative. 

She is applying for a loan to purchase additional stock like milk, canned goods and sugar for her sari-sari store. 

Lolita deeply wishes to maintain her member in good standing status with PMPC.

loans.use: to purchase additional stock like milk, canned goods and sugar for her sari-sari store.

loans.name: Anselmo

texts.en: Anselmo, 46 years old, is married with 5 children. He settled for a living in Ramon Magsaysay with his family. He operates a farm where he grows rice. He has been involved in this business for over 20 years. His business is located in a fertile area and is his primary source of income. Anselmo will use this loan to pay for farm labor and buy farm inputs like new seedlings and fertilizer to have a more productive farm. His business goal is to be a successful farmer and he will use the anticipated profits to invest in business.

loans.use: to pay for farm labor and buy farm inputs like new seedlings and fertilizer to have a more productive farm

loans.name: Neslie

texts.en:
Neslie works hard to help provide for her family. For the past seven years she has run her own “sari-sari,” or variety store, and has made a good living doing so.

Neslie has taken out and successfully repaid previous loans for her business through CCT. To improve sales she is applying for a 35,000 PHP loan to buy additional quantities and varieties of grocery items, toiletries and beverages to sell.

Neslie is determined to earn a greater income so she can better provide for her family. She sincerely wishes to give you heartfelt thanks and appreciation for any assistance in advance.
