texts.es: Carolina vive en casa propia con sus dos hijos y su esposo, ella se dedica al cultivo de maíz desde hace varios años y con lo que gana de sus ventas logra Salir adelante, ella quiere mejorar su vivienda terminando de construir el cuarto donde muestra la fotografía pero no tienen de suficiente capital por esa razón solicita un crédito para la compra de los materiales necesarios como: lamina, hierro, cemento, ladrillos, arena, polines, balcones y pago de mano de obra para que el y su familia puedan vivir mas cómodos y seguros
texts.en: Carolina lives in her own home with her 2 children and her husband. She has made a living harvesting corn for several years and with the income she earns from her sales she is able to get ahead. She wants to improve her residence by finishing the room shown in the photograph, but they do not have enough capital and this is the reason for her loan request. She will use it to purchase the necessary materials such as: sheets, iron, cement, bricks, sand, idlers, balconies and the payment for labor so that her and her family can live more comfortable and safe.

loans.use: purchase sheet, iron, cement, bricks, sand, idlers, balconies and labor costs

loans.name: Forjadores Del Mañana Los Olivos Group

texts.es: Laura es una mujer casada tiene dos hijos uno de 10 y el otro de 3 años Laura pertenece al grupo "Forjadoras del mañana" un grupo unido y responsable,Laura se dedica a la venta de joyas en plata por el cual solicito el préstamo a Edaprospo para comprar platería fina  y así poder hacer sus joyas,como collares, anillos, aretes y demás ya que anteriormente se dedicaba a la venta por catalogo, Laura ofrece sus productos a diferentes instituciones que ya saben que son productos de primera, su mayor virtud es ser una mujer luchadora que ha sabido llegar al mas exquisito cliente,no se deja vencer por mas obstáculos que se le pongan en el camino  y agradece a los inversionistas Kiva por la ayuda brindada y dice:"Gracias Kiva por confiar en mi".
texts.en: Laura is a married woman who has two children, one of whom is ten and the other three years old. She is a member of the close knit and responsible group "Forjadoras del mañana". She makes a living by selling jewellery and is therefore asking for a loan from Edaprospo to purchase sterling silver which would allow her to make her jewellery such as necklaces, rings and earrings. Also, as she used to make a living from catalog sales, Laura offers her products to different institutions that already know that they are high quality products. She is a hardworking woman that knows how to get to the most refined of clients. She does not quit no matter how many obstacles are put in her way. She is grateful to all Kiva lenders for the assistance they have provided and she says: "Thank you Kiva for trusting in me".

loans.use: to purchase silver to carry on making jewellery such as earrings, necklaces, rings etc.

loans.name: Bwasiri Women Group

texts.en:
Jane is a 35-year-old, married woman. She has four children and lives in Kyenjojo, Uganda. She has been in agriculture for many years. She sells Irish potatoes along the highway, to get money to educate her children. Jane is faced with the high cost of meeting the educational requirements of her children. She has a dream of educating them to university. She is faced with price fluctuations of her products, which reduce her profits, and that makes it hard to see her dream of educating her children fulfilled. Jane‘s business, being small, cannot support her to pay fees all at once. Therefore, she is requesting a loan to pay school fees for the children. 

The extra people in the photo are also group members who have saved and guaranteed fellow members according to the Hofokam policy but have not taken the loan.

loans.use: to pay school fees for her children.

loans.name: Alejandro

texts.es:
Alejandro es una persona muy trabajadora que gracias a su esfuerzo diario ha logrado sacar adelante sus estudios. 

Desde hace un año comenzó a vender productos de uso personal a las personas más cercanas a él como familiares, amigo y compañeros de estudio.

Con este negocio es ha intentado sostener sus estudios y tratado de ayudar en los gastos de su hogar.

Solicita un apoyo económico para comprar surtido de productos de uso personal como desodorantes y cremas.

Así podrá sostener su negocio y continuar trabando.
texts.en:
Alejandro is a very hardworking person, who, thanks to his daily effort, has made great achievements in his studies. One year ago, he began to sell personal care products to the people close to him, like his relatives, friends, and classmates. With this business, he has endeavored to sustain his studies and help with the expenses of his home. 

Alejandro is requesting a loan to buy a selection of personal care products, such as deodorant and cream. This way, he will be able to sustain his business and continue working.

loans.use: to buy a selection of personal care products, like deodorant and body cream.

loans.name: María Fernanda

texts.es:
Maria es una joven emprendedora, aplicada, inteligente y dedicada.
Encontró en la venta de mercancía como artículos para el aseo personal, la manera para generar buenos ingresos para sostener sus estudios universitarios y ayudar con los gastos de su hogar.

Hoy en día está iniciando con un capital muy pequeño y está en etapa de recolección de clientes, por esta razón solicita un préstamo para la compra de surtido de productos como cremas de manos, desodorantes, lociones, enjugues, entre otros, al por mayor y así poder abastecer su pequeño negocio con productos de calidad.

Con la ayuda del préstamo podrá impulsar su negocio y tendrá una mejor variedad de productos para ofertar, logrando así la consolidación de su negocio y la obtención de mejores utiidades.
texts.en:
Maria is a hardworking, focused, intelligent, and dedicated young woman. She found, in the sale of merchandise like personal care products, the way to generate good income in order to sustain her university studies and help with the expenses of her home. 

Today, she is initiating her business with very little capital and is in the process of acquiring customers. For this reason, Maria is requesting a loan for the purchase of products such as hand cream, deodorant, lotions, hair creams, and other things. This way, she will be able to fortify her small business with quality products. With the help of this loan, she will be able to jump start her business an she will have a great variety of products to offer. This way, she will achieve the consolidation of her business and attainment of better profits.

loans.use: to buy a selection of products, such as hand cream, deodorant, and lotions.

loans.name: Yesith Jose

texts.es:
Yesith tiene gran experiencia en el área de panadería, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia panadería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.

Siempre le ha gustado trabajar de manera independiente.

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para comprar una motocicleta para el transporte de sus insumos y productos, también usara el dinero para capitalizar su negocio con la compra de ingredientes.

El préstamo le permitirá trabajar de una manera más tranquila.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran panadería que surta diferentes tiendas.
texts.en:
Yesith has a lot of experience in the bakery area. Some time ago, he set up his own bakery, which up to now has generated very good results for him. He has always liked to work independently.

He now needs assistance to buy a motorcycle for the transport of his supplies and products. He will also use the money to capitalize his business with the purchase of ingredients. The loan will allow him to work in a more serene manner.

His great dream is to be able to have a big bakery that supplies various stores.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle to transport his supplies and his products.

loans.name: Javier De Jesus

texts.es:
Javier, con 37 años de edad se caracteriza por ser un hombre muy responsable y trabajador, un visionario y buen negociante. 

Siempre ha trabajado como comerciante, vendiendo pipetas de gas y desde hace 4 años tiene su propio negocio.  

Ha sabido superar tiempos difíciles en el comercio y sueña con comprarse su casa propia y tener un negocio que perdure en el tiempo; es por ello que Javier acudió a solicitar un préstamo, el cual utilizará para comprar surtido de pipetas de gas. 

Javier es un hombre muy organizado y le gusta ofrecer a sus clientes los productos de la mejor manera.

La suma de todo estos esfuerzos le brindan a toda su familia una calidad de vida excelente y sin mayores inconvenientes.
texts.en:
Javier, who is 37 years old, is characterized as being a very responsible and hard-working man, a visionary and a good marketer.

He has always worked as a businessman, selling cylinders of gas, and he has had his own business for four years.

He has known how to overcome difficult times in business, and he dreams of buying his own house and having a business that will be long-lasting. It is for this that Javier has turned to applying for a loan, which he will use to purchase a stock of gas cylinders.

Javier is a very organized man, and he likes to offer products to his customers in the best way.

The sum of all these efforts offers his whole family an excellent quality of life without great difficulties.

loans.use: to buy a stock of gas cylinders.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To buy different kinds of wood.

loans.name: Luz Aurora

texts.es:
Luz, de 62 años, tiene un negocio de prestación de servicio de parqueadero en el municipio de Medellín con el afán de buscar una actividad que le generara ingresos para poder sobrevivir.

Tuvo que afrontar la muerte de su esposo hace algún tiempo y desde ese momento ha trabajado fuertemente para su sostenimiento y el de sus hijos.

Solicita un préstamo para realizar una adecuación y ampliación locativa a su parqueadero.

Con este préstamo podrá mejorar su servicio y obtendrá recursos para sostener  a sus hijos brindándoles una calidad de vida mejor.

Apoya a Luz para que pueda continuar con su actividad!
texts.en:
Luz, 62 years old, has a parking space rental business in the municipality of Medellín. She has a great desire to have a business that will generate income so she can survive.

She had to confront the death of her husband a while ago, and since that moment she has worked hard to provide for herself and her children. She is requesting a loan for the improvement and expansion of her parking lot location. With this loan she will be able to improve her service and she will earn income provide her for her children, giving them a better quality of life.

Support Luz so she can continue with her business.

loans.use: to carry out the improvement and expansion of her parking lot location.

loans.name: Carlos Mario

texts.es:
Carlos inicio la venta de productos para uso personal específicamente desde hace algunos meses, actividad aprendida de manera empírica, busco esta actividad como un alternativa de generar dinero, como hombre pujante, busca el sustento para su hogar conformado por sus dos hijos. 

Debido al alza de los precios de la canasta familiar, del arriendo, gastos escolares, Carlos se ve en la necesidad de generar un mayor volumen de ingresos y es por este motivo que necesita un crédito que la ayude a mejorar la variedad de productos que vende y que diariamente ofrece a sus clientes. 

Solicita un crédito para la compra de surtido de mercancía para añadirlos a su portafolio de productos. 

Su principal sueño es poder convertirse en el propietario de un almacén y generar mejores ingresos.
texts.en:
A few months ago Carlos started selling personal care products, a business he learned on his own.  He sought out this activity as a means to earn money since he is an energetic man who supports his household which consists of two children.

Due to the price increase in food, rent, and school costs, Carlos needs to generate more income.  Therefore, he is requesting a loan to help buy a variety of products to sell daily to his customers.

The loan he is requesting is to buy a variety of merchandise to add to his list of products.  His main goal is to become a store owner and generate more income.

loans.use: To buy different merchandise.

loans.name: Argemiro

texts.es:
Argemiro es un pescador humilde y trabajador de 55 años de edad, que desde pequeño aprendió todas las labores de la pesca, gracias a las enseñanzas de su padre.

Actualmente realiza su actividad de forma artesanal y el resultado de su pesca es vendido en la plaza de mercado del municipio de Turbo, con este oficio ha sacado adelante a su familia con mucho esfuerzo y sacrifico, pero sin dejar de lado esa simpatía que siempre lo ha caracterizado. 

Se motiva a solicitar un aliento económico con el fin de invertirlo en la compra de un manto para pescar y un congelador para almacenar su pesca y conservar siempre fresco su producto, de esta forma podrá mejorar la productividad de su trabajo, lo que beneficiará los ingresos que percibe por cada venta.

Argemiro manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es seguir luchando para generar una estabilidad económica y brindar a su familia mejores condiciones de vida y bienestar.
texts.en:
Argemiro is a humble and hard-working fisherman. He is 55 years old and from a young age learned all about fishing from his father.

Argemiro is an artisan fisherman. He sells his catch at the market square in the municipality of Turbo. This trade has allowed Argemiro to help his family to move forward. It has taken a lot of effort and sacrifice but Argemiro has never lost the kindness for which he is so well-known.

Argemiro is applying for a loan in order to invest in a a fishing blanket and a freezer to store his fish and keep it fresh. This will allow Argemiro to improve productivity in his work, which will increase his income from sales.

Argemiro says that his greatest desire is to continue fighting to generate financial stability and to provide his family with better living conditions and well-being.

loans.use: to buy a freezer and a fishing blanket.

loans.name: Zuly Maritza

texts.es:
Zuly vive con su pareja y tienen 3 hijos de 8, 4 y 10 años, vive felizmente junto con su familia en zona rural del municipio de Caparrapi.

En la actualidad ya cumplió 10 años de estar trabajando con la cría de cerdos de engorde, actividad con la que ha intentado sobrevivir y sacar adelante a su familia para que nunca les falte nada. 

Ha tenido dificultades económicas que han afectado su negocio y que lo han obligado a detener sus actividades en ciertas ocasiones. 

Sueña con mejorar el lugar para la cría de sus animales y también con tener una planta de engorde de pollos, por esto pasa la solicitud de un préstamo, el cual invertirá en la adecuación del corral de sus cerdos de engorde los cuales tienen muy buena aceptación por la buena crianza y mantenimiento de los mismos. 

Su calidad de vida  y la de su familia se incrementará en la medida que aumentan las ventas de sus animales y alcance las metas establecidas para  un futuro no lejano.

Con el apoyo de este préstamo Zuly podrá continuar trabajando y podrá darle a su familia todo lo mejor.
texts.en:
Zuly lives with her life partner, and they have three children, ages 8, 4, and 10.  She lives happily with her family in a rural area in the Caparrapi municipality.

She has now completed ten years of working by raising and fattening pigs.  She does this in order to survive and to get her family ahead so that they want for nothing.

She has had financial difficulties that have affected her business.  This has obliged her to stop her business activities on certain occasions.  She dreams of improving the place where she raises the animals.  She also dreams of having a business of fattening chickens.

She is requesting a loan in order to make adaptations to the pen where she fattens the pigs.  The pigs are very well-received because of the good way that she raises and maintains them.  

Her quality of life and that of her family will increase to the extent that her animal sales increase.  She will reach her established goals in the near future.  With the support of this loan, Zuly will be able to continue working, and she will be able to give her family all of the best.

loans.use: to make improvements to the pigpen.

loans.name: Mary Luz

texts.es:
Mary cuenta con una experiencia de 15 años en la actividad de la confección, tiene su taller de confección a terceros en su casa desde hace 2 años.

 Trabaja durante todo el día y con su taller genera 6 empleos para personas con muchas necesidades. 

Esta actividad la aprendió de su madre quien le enseñó desde muy pequeña. La ventaja es que ya tiene reconocimiento en el sector y la producción es muy buena, lo que le ha permitido cada vez conseguir más clientes para su negocio y también se ha transformado en grandes pedidos. 

Debido a que en la actualidad su capacidad de producción no alcanza para satisfacer a todos sus clientes, Mary requiere de un préstamo para comprar una máquina 2 agujas para aumentar la capacidad de producción de su negocio.

Su mayor anhelo es salir adelante con su taller de confección y poder tener en su hogar unas mejores oportunidades económicas para progresar junto a su esposo y su hijo.
texts.en:
Mary has fifteen years of experience in the tailoring business. She has had her workshop for dressmaking for wholesale suppliers in her home for the past two years. She works the whole day and in her workshop, she generates six jobs for people with many needs. 

Mary learned this trade from her mother, who taught her when she was very young. The advantage is that she already has recognition in the sector and her production is very good. This has permitted her to get more and more clients for her business and the transformation has generated giant orders.

Because at the moment her production capacity cannot satisfy all of her customers, Mary needs a loan to buy a sewing machine with two needs to increase the production capacity of her business. 

Her greatest dream is to move forward with her dressmaking workshop and be able to have in her home better financial opportunities for to make progress, along with her husband and her son.

loans.use: to buy a sewing machine with two needles

loans.name: Luz Amparo

texts.es:
Luz, con 50 años de edad, se ha dedicado por 6 años a administrar una distribuidora de arroz y una tienda de abarrotes en el municipio de Puerto Salgar donde reside; de esta forma complementa los ingresos con los que ha sacado adelante a sus hijos.

Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido luchar incansablemente, siempre buscando la manera de salir adelante, esto la impulsa a solicitar el crédito para pagar el trámite de traspaso de los documentos de propiedad del vehículo que utiliza para transportar el arroz que vende , esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y tendrá la ventaja de tener su propio vehículo para trabajar.

Luz manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder adquirir un local propio ubicado en el centro del municipio para montar su negocio y lograr que sea mucho más rentable y que le garantice una estabilidad económica favorable para brindar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Luz,  50 years old, has been running a rice distribution business and a grocery store for the last six years in the town of Puerto Salgar where she lives.  In this way she gets all the income with which she has helped her children get ahead.
 
Her persistence and tenacity have helped Luz to struggle without tiring, always looking for a way to get ahead.  This has led her to ask for  a loan to pay for processing conveyance of title for the vehicle she uses to transport the rice she sells.  

This will allow Luz to continue with her work and gave her the advantage of working using her own vehicle.  Luz says her big dream is to be able to buy a location located in the center of town for her business and make her business much more profitable, guaranteeing her desirable financial stabilty so that she can provide a better quality of life to her family.

loans.use: to pay for the processing of the conveyance of  title for the vehicle she uses to transport rice

loans.name: Fabio

texts.es:
El señor Fabio tiene gran experiencia en el área de panadería, hace algún tiempo inicio con su propia panadería que hasta ahora le ha generado muy buenos resultados.

Siempre ha preferido trabajar independiente, trabaja todos los días desde las 8:00 Am hasta las 9:00 Pm

Actualmente necesita un auxilio para comprar un horno, materia prima e insumos para sus productos.
 
El préstamo le permitirá trabajar en unas mejores condiciones y podrá garantizar la calidad de sus preparaciones.

Su mayor sueño es poder tener una gran panadería que surta diferentes tiendas.

Con esta ayuda podrá trabajar de una manera más productiva y con mejor capital.
texts.en:
Fabio has a lot of experience in baking. Some time ago, he opened his own bakery and so far he has achieved very good results. He has always preferred to work independently. He works every day from 8 a. m. to 9 p. m. At the moment, he needs help to buy an oven, supplies and ingredients for his products.

The loan he is asking for will allow him to work in better conditions and will ensure the quality of his products. His dream is to have a big bakery which delivers to various stores. With the assistance of the loan, he will be able work more productively and with more capital.

loans.use: to buy an oven, supplies and ingredients for his products.

loans.name: Tatiana Alejandra

texts.es:
Tatiana es una mujer dedicada a su familia y a su labor. 

Su tenacidad y perseverancia le han permitido salir adelante, sobrepasando diversos obstáculos que se le presentan. 

Desde hace 8 años inició su propio negocio, un salón de masajes que ubicó en un espacio de la casa donde reside. 

Esto le ha permitido generar los recursos suficientes para apoyar a su esposo con la carga económica del hogar y a solventar las necesidades de su único hijo. 

El crédito que solicita lo invertirá en la compra de un ultra cavitación e insumos al por mayor (tratamientos, cremas, entre otros), esto le permitirá continuar con su labor y prestar un servicio más completo a sus clientes, de una manera más ágil y eficiente; lo que beneficiará el margen de utilidades que percibe por su labor. 

Tatiana manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder continuar con su labor, acreditar y fortalecer bien su negocio para lograr ser más competitiva en el mercado y así tener la capacidad para brindar una mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Tatiana is a woman who is dedicated to her family and her work. Her tenacity and perseverance have allowed her to get ahead, overcoming the various obstacles that have occurred. She has had her own business for 8 years, a message salon that is located in part of her house. This allows her to generate sufficient resources to help her husband with the economic obligations of the household and provide for the needs of her son.

The loan that she is requesting will be invested in the purchase of an ultrasonic cavitation machine and wholesale supplies (treatments and creams amongst others). This will allow her to continue with her work and offer a more complete service to her clients in a more flexible and efficient manner. It will improve the margin of profits that she receives for her labor. Tatiana says that her main wish is to continue with her work. She wants to establish and strengthen her business to become more competitive in the market and have the capacity to provide a higher quality of living for her family.

loans.use: to buy an ultrasonic cavitation machine and supplies wholesale.

loans.name: Yaredis Maria

texts.es:
Humilde y trabajadora, así es Yaredis, una mujer guerrera que ha dedicado gran parte de su vida al cuidado de sus hijos, vive en el municipio de Sincelejo, donde se gana la vida con la preparación de comidas rápidas en un carrito de comidas.

Sus alimentos son conocidos por los vecinos del sector, quienes visitan su punto de trabajo porque saben que podrá comer de una manera deliciosa.

Yaredis ha decidido mejorar su negocio y aumentar sus ventas, compra de surtido de gaseosas e insumos para sus preparaciones.

Este préstamo le permitirá sacar adelante su negocio para obtener así los ingresos necesarios que le den la oportunidad de continuar sosteniendo a su familia y su negocio.

Apoya a esta mujer con un préstamo y haz realidad sus sueños!
texts.en:
Yaredis is humble and hard-working. She is a woman warrior who has dedicated a good part of her life caring for her children. She lives in the municipality of Sincelejo, where she earns her living preparing fast food on a food cart.

Her foods are known by the neighbors in the sector, who visit her workplace because they know that they will be able to eat delicious food.

Yaredis has decided to improve her business and increase her sales, and purchase a variety of soft drinks and supplies for her food preparations. 

This loan will allow her to get her business ahead and, in turn, to get the income necessary to give her the opportunity to continue sustaining her family and her business. 

Support this woman with a loan and make her dreams come true!

loans.use: to purchase an assortment of soft drinks and supplies to make her food.

loans.name: Cristian

texts.es:
Cristian es un joven campesino de 18 años de edad, trabajador y humilde, que desde niño aprendió a realizar todas las labores del campo, gracias a las enseñanzas de sus padres. 

Esto le ha permitido progresar y, hoy en día posee un cultivo de café, cultivo que atiende todos los días y las cosechas son vendidas en la plaza de mercado del municipio. 

Con el apoyo del crédito comprará insumos agrícolas al por mayor (abonos, pesticidas, fertilizantes y otros), con esto seguirá cuidando sus cultivos y tendrá una mejor cosecha, mucho más productiva, con lo que mejorará los ingresos a la hora de vender sus productos. 

Cristian, con su espíritu emprendedor, su pujanza y tenacidad, quiere seguir luchando para cumplir el sueño de tener una finca propia, en la que pueda cultivar mucha más variedad de productos y así mejorar la rentabilidad del negocio, garantizando una estabilidad económica para dar mejor calidad de vida a su familia.
texts.en:
Cristian is a young man from the countryside, 18 years old, hard-working and humble, who since childhood learned to do every kind of work in the field, thanks to his parents' teaching.

This has allowed him to get ahead and today he owns a coffee field, a field he cares for daily, selling the harvests in the market plaza in town.

With the help of the loan, Cristian will buy farm supplies in bulk (manure,  pesticides, fertilizers and others).  With the loan he will keep caring for his crops and will have a better harvest, much more productive, with which he will get more income at the time of selling khis products.

Cristian, with his enterprising spirit, tenacity and drive, wants to continue struggling to fulfill his dream of having his own farm, where he could plant a much wider variety of products and thus improve the profitability of the business, guaranteeing financial stability to give a better quality  of life to his family.

loans.use: to buy farm products in bulk (manure, pesticides, fertilizers and others)

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel ha sido un hombre muy trabajador toda su vida, vive solo y desde siempre le ha gustado trabajar como comerciante independiente, comenzó a vender mercancía por catálogo pues desea tener un buen futuro y mejorar su calidad de vida.

Sus clientes son vecinos, familiares y amigos del sector y encuentra en su labor la ventaja de poder estudiar y salir adelante, al mismo tiempo que logra ser productiva como comerciante.

Actualmente solicita el crédito para comprar surtido al por mayor (perfumería, cremas corporales, cosméticos, accesorios, entre otros), esto le permitirá abastecerse con más variedad para satisfacer la demanda que se incrementa en la temporada de navidad, dando como resultado la obtención de mejores ingresos para su familia.

Daniel manifiesta que su mayor anhelo es poder seguir creciendo como empresario y como persona.
texts.en:
Daniel has worked hard all his life. He lives alone and has always enjoyed being an independent businessman. He started to sell products on a catalogue, thinking of having a good future and improving his living conditions.

His customers are neighbors, relatives and friends. He thinks that the advantage of this business is that he can study and get ahead while becoming a productive businessman.

Daniel is requesting a loan to buy products in bulk, such as perfumes, body creams, cosmetics and accessories. This way, he will be able to offer a wider variety and fulfill his customers' demands, which increase during the Christmas season. This will result in a better income for his family.

Daniel says that his biggest dream is to be able to continue growing, both as a businessman and as a person.

loans.use: to buy products in bulk, such as perfumes, body creams, cosmetics and accessories.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: To purchase ingredients in order to make fast food for her food cart.

loans.name: Daniel

texts.es:
Daniel es un hombre con gran empuje y emprendimiento, desde hace que termino sus estudios en barbería se determino a montar su propio negocio de barbería y cortes que le generara buenos ingresos y que le permitiera ser independiente.

Es un negocio bastante popular en el sector y se ha convertido en punto de encuentro para jóvenes y adultos que desean un buen corte y atención de calidad.

Con tan poco tiempo en el mercado ya tiene cierto nivel de reconocimiento gracias a la buena gestión de Daniel.

El solicita un préstamo para realizar una mejora locativa en su negocio y hacerlo más seguro, desea hacerlo mucho más atractivo y cómodo para sus clientes. 

El ofrece trabajo a una persona y desea generar otros empleos.
texts.en:
Daniel is a man with great drive and entrepreneurship. Since he finished his barber studies he decided to start his own barber and hair cutting business, with which he generates good earnings, and which allows him to be independent.

It's a fairly popular business in the area, and has become a meeting place for young people and adults who want a good haircut and quality service. 

With such little time on the market, it already has a certain level of recognition thanks to Daniel's good management.

He asks for a loan to make improvements in the location of his business and to make it more secure. He hopes to make it much more attractive and comfortable for his customers. 

He employs one person, and hopes to generate more jobs.

loans.use: to make improvements in the location of his business and to make it more secure.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Allan

texts.en:
36-year-old Allan has continued to grow his business. Allan, who runs a Zoona Money transfer business, has expanded his business by opening three more Zoona outlets and employed three tellers to help him with the business.

Allan is grateful to all his Kiva lenders for the financial help. He says the loans have helped him to grow his business and increase his profit turnover. This has made sure that he does not bounce customers and is able to provide for his family. 

Allan enjoys his business because it is an easier way for people to send receive money throughout the country. He is happy to provide the service to his community. Allan say says the biggest challenge he has is low working capital.

He is requesting a Kiva loan to help him purchase a trading booth, which will make sure that his location is easily located and help him save on rentals. Having a branded booth helps Allan’s business as his place of business will be more visible to customers. He is hopeful that the loan from Kiva will help him grow his business.

loans.use: To purchase a Zoona-branded mobile money booth where he can serve his customers

loans.name: Turgun

texts.ru: Тургун родился  22 марта 1983 года  в кишлаке  Ниджани города  Истаравшан Согдийской области в семье ветеринарного врача. Женат и  имеет двоих детей. Он  увлекался животноводством с  детства. В течении четырех лет он занимается животноводством. Также для дополнительного дохода он занимается дехканством. Он имеет в дехканском хозяйстве 1,8 га земли, из них 0,4 гектара винограда, и 1,4 гектара для выращивания   овощей и лука корма для скота. В животноводстве  ему помогает жена и его племянники. Он хочет получить кредит для покупки скота. Он заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en: Turgun was born on March 22, 1983 in Nidzhani, a small village located near the town of Istaravshan, in the Sughd province of Tajikistan.  His father was a veterinarian.  Turgun is married and the father of two children.  Since his childhood, he has always loved to take care of livestock and has himself been involved in animal husbandry for the past four years.  In order to make an additional source of income he also works at the farm where he owns 1.8 hectare of land.  He grows grapes on 0.4 hectare and vegetables and cull onions (to be used as livestock feed) on 1.4 hectare.  His wife and nephews help him to run the farming business.  Turgun is taking a loan to buy some livestock.  He thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support.

loans.use: to buy some livestock.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more stock for her husband's general store

loans.name: Sayit

texts.ru: Сайит житель  кишлака Гулистон Шахристанского района. Сайит сотрудничает с МДО Арванд с 2012 года. Женат и  имеет троих детей. Сайит занимается земледелием и животноводством. Для расширения своей деятельности он решил взять кредит. На полученый кредит он купил несколько крупно рогатого скота, чтобы откармливать и продать на местном рынке и получить доход. На этот раз с обоюдного согласия семьи Сайит обратился в МДО «Арванд» за следующим кредитом  для земледелии, с этим видом деятельности  хочет принести дополнительный доход, чтобы поставит на ноги 3-х детей. Сайит хочет собрать свой урожай, но для этого у него не хватает денежных средств  для решения этих проблем Сайит с уважением обратился в МДО Арванд за кредитом. Он выражает свою благодарность за такую возможность и доверие.
texts.en:
Sayit is a resident of the village of Guliston in the Shahriston region. He is married with three children and has been working with Arvand since 2012. He works in agriculture and animal husbandry and has decided to take out a loan to expand his business. With his last loan, he bought a few head of livestock to fatten and resell at the market for a profit. This time, in agreement with his family, he has turned to Arvand for a loan to increase income from the agricultural side of his business, to help put his three children on their feet. 

Sayit wants to bring in his harvest, but he doesn't have enough money. To solve these problems he has respectfully turned to MDO Arvand so to help him. He expresses his thanks for such possibility and faith.

loans.use: to rent a machine to bring in his harvest

loans.name: Blema Tesaa Group

texts.en:
Patience, a member of 'Blema Tesa' (Rock of Ages) Group, is 39 and single. Patience (standing on the right in the photograph) sells firewood at her residence. She has been doing this job for 11 years. This has enabled her to meet her needs. As a trader, she would like to take advantage of an available opportunity to provide service to all people who use firewood as a means of fuel. 

Patience has dreams of expanding her business. Patience lacks enough capital, which has led to the sluggish growth of her business. She, therefore, needs a loan to boost her business. So, together with Rebecca, the group needs a total of 3,800 GHS to boost their businesses.

loans.use: To buy more firewood to sell to customers

loans.name: Santa Rosa Group

texts.es:
El grupo Santa Rosa es un grupo numeroso y muy unido, está compuesto por 19 mujeres que se caracterizan por ser trabajadoras y fomentar el trabajo en equipo basadas en la solidaridad y cooperación.
La Sra. Antonia, integrante de este grupo, es muy emprendedora, trabaja en su propia casa, tiene un comedor y cuenta con muchos clientes debido a que vende comidas ricas e higiénicamente preparadas. Su sueño es poder seguir creciendo y poder dar fuente de trabajo a otras personas que de la misma manera que ella quiere salir adelante.
Pide este préstamo para la compra de insumos por cantidad para su comedor, como verduras, carnes, y condimentos. Agradece por la oportunidad que todas reciben y que les será de mucha ayuda.
texts.en:
The Santa Rosa Group is a large and close-knit group of 19 women who define themselves as workers and foster teamwork based on solidarity and cooperation.

Antonia, a member of this group, is very enterprising. She works from home where she runs a canteen. She has many customers because she sells food which is delicious and hygienically prepared. Her dream is to continue to grow and be able to offer work to other people who, like her, want to get ahead.

She is asking for this loan for the bulk purchase of supplies for her canteen, such as vegetables, meat and condiments. She is grateful for the opportunity which they are all receiving, which will be of great help to them.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat and seasonings for use in food preparation.

loans.name: Las Mercedes Group

texts.es:
Las Mercedes es un grupo formado en la ciudad de Santaní, una ciudad bastante alejada de la capital del país, que es eminentemente rural. Cada una lucha y se esfuerza por salir adelante
La Sra. Evangelista integrante de este grupo, es muy emprendedora, trabaja en su propia casa, donde monta una despensita y ofrece todos los productos de la canasta familiar a las personas de su barrio. Ella está luchando por poder crecer y ayudar a su familia, con el préstamo que pide quiere comprar insumos varios para su despensa, como ser bebidas, lácteos, verduras, productos a granel y demás. 
Ella quiere seguir progresando en su negocio, es por eso que decidió unirse a este grupo.
texts.en:
Las Mercedes is a group made up in the city of Santani. This city is very far away from the capital of the country, and it is mostly a rural area.

Each member struggles and makes efforts to get ahead. Evangelista, who is a member of the group, is very enterprising. She works in her own house, where she has a small grocery store. She offers basic needs products to her neighbors. She is working hard to be able to get ahead and support her family.

She wants to use the loan to buy supplies for her store, such as drinks, dairy products, vegetables, products in bulk, and others. 
She wants to keep thriving with her business, and that is why she decided to join this group.

loans.use: to buy drinks, dairy products, vegetables, products in bulk, and others.

loans.name: Norma Mariana

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo de Crédito Luz De América,
En este lugar vive la señora Norma, tiene 65 años de edad y mantiene una relación de unión libre de la cual tiene cinco hijos mayores de edad, cuatro de ellos aun  vive en su casa, la menor estudia en universidad. El marido es comerciante.
Doña Norma es una mujer que le gusta salir adelante y ayudarle a su marido con los gastos del hogar, ella tiene una pequeña tienda de víveres en su casa donde vende todo tipo de productos de primera necesidad, granos, legumbres, plátano y ciertas bebidas, allí ella también vende productos de bazar, helados entre otras cosas, a ella le gusta tener bien surtida su tienda para darles a sus clientes lo que necesitan, le encanta su negocio ya que allí ella se gana la vida, lleva 10  años con su tienda, la cual surtió con el primer crédito que recibió del grupo.
Este crédito es para comprar víveres para surtir su tienda. Lleva 9 años en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta por el apoyo que les brinda la institución para salir adelante en su negocio. Sus sueños son que su hija sea una profesional.
texts.en:
The members of the "Luz De América" (Light of America) communal bank meet every two weeks in Portoviejo, Manabí's capital.  The area has been known for many years as the city of the true tamarinds. 
This is where señora Norma lives.  She is 65-years old and is married.  She has five grown children, four of whom still live at home.  The youngest is studying at the university.  Her husband is a businessman. 
Doña Norma is a woman who likes to get ahead and to help her husband with the household expenses.  She has a small grocery store set up in their home.  She sells all types of basic necessities, like grains, vegetables, bananas and some beverages.  She also sells miscellaneous household items and ice cream, among other things.  She likes to have her store well stocked so she can offer her customers what they need.  Doña Norma loves her business, as that is where she earns her living.  She has had her store for ten years, and she stocked it with the first loan she received from the communal bank. 
This loan is for purchasing supplies to stock up her store.  Doña Norma has been with her communal bank for nine years.  She likes it because of the help the institution provides her in getting ahead with her business.  Her dream is for her daughter to have a career.

loans.use: to purchase supplies.

loans.name: Marilou

texts.en:
Marilou is a 34-year-old woman from the municipality of Carles, in Iloilo. She is married, with three children ages 7, 8, and 12. For the last 12 years she and her husband has been dependent on fishing to earn a living and support her children's needs. 

She is asking a loan of 30,000 PHP to buy a boat engine and fishing nets. 

Marilou plans to continue with the improvements on her livelihood after the typhoon ravaged their place last year. This is her only means to recover her income.

In the future she hope to see her children become professionals.

loans.use: to buy a boat engine and fishing nets

loans.name: Hugo Patricio

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo de Crédito Luz De América,
En este lugar vive el señor Hugo, tiene 22 años de edad, está soltero y  vive en casa de sus padres. Lleva un año en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta porque gracias a los créditos él puede salir adelante en su negocio.
Don Hugo es un joven muy trabajador que le gusta para así salir adelante y también ayudar con los gastos a su padres, el se dedica al comercio, tiene un negocio de venta de frutas y legumbres, de madrugada el se va al mercado de mayoristas  a abastecerse de todos los productos que vende recorriendo la ciudad,  lleva más de 4 años dedicado a esta actividad con la cual se gana su sustento diario.
Este crédito es para comprar frutas y legumbres para su negocio. Sus sueños son seguir mejorando su negocio cada día más.
texts.en:
In the city of Portoviejo, the capital of the province of Manabí, known for many years as the city of the Royal Tamarind Trees, the members of the credit group Luz de América meet every fortnight.
Hugo lives here, he is 22, is single and lives with his parents. He has been with this credit group for one year and he likes it because thanks to the loans, he is able to move forward with his business.
Hugo is a very hard working  young man and likes to get ahead and help his parents with their expenses. He works in business. He has his own business of selling fruit and vegetables. In the early hours of the morning he goes to the wholesale market to stock up on all the products that he sells around the city. He has been doing this for over four years and it provides for his daily expenses. 
This loan is to buy fruit and vegetables for his business. His dream is to continue improving his business more every day.

loans.use: to buy fruit and vegetables.

loans.name: Melecia

texts.en:
As a married parent of four children, Melecia works hard to support her family.

She has a farming rice business in the Philippines, and also earns additional income from a general store. 

Melecia  is borrowing PHP 10,000 through NWTF to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies for her farming rice business.

She has been sustaining her business activities through her past 14 loans from NWTF. She hopes that her hard work will help her attain her dream to save enough money so she could afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizer and other farm supplies

loans.name: Tunamerimwe Group

texts.fr:
Eric fait partie du groupe Tunamerimwe et  habite à Gitega. Il a 28 ans et est marié à Sylvie une commerçante. Ensemble ils ont 1 enfant.

ll fait le commerce de bananes depuis 4 ans.

Il  est à son troisième  crédit  à Turame. Avec le crédit KIVA qu’il obtient, il  va  augmenter son capital et acheter une  grande quantité de bananes  à transformer pour  vendre de la bière  pour gagner plus.

Dans  prochaines années, il voudrait  voir ses enfants étudier.
texts.en:
Eric is a member of the Tunamerimwe Group and he lives in Gitega. He is 28 years old and married to Sylvie, a storekeeper. They have had one child together. Eric has been selling bananas for four years. This will be his third loan with Turame.

With this Kiva loan, he will be able to increase his buying power and purchase a large quantity of bananas, which will be transformed into beer and resold at a profit. In the coming years, he would like to see his children receive an education.

loans.use: to increase their buying power and purchase a large quantity of bananas, which will be transformed into beer and resold at a profit

loans.name: Samson's Group

texts.en:
Samson is 58 years old and has five children. He is a group leader, and is representing his group, formed by nine farmers in Butere District, Kenya. 

Samson has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of his desire to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds and, although he described his last harvest as poor due to bad weather conditions, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Samson also decided to purchase a solar light as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to have light during dark hours for his children to be able to study.

Obtaining this loan means that Samson's Group will be able to receive a total of four solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 4.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Simon's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Simon, who, as a group leader, is representing his group formed by nine farmers in Butere District, Kenya. He is married and is a father to three children. He known by his community as a very reliable person.

Initially, Simon joined One Acre Fund in 2011 because he wanted to get the best quality fertilizer and hybrid seeds. Since he joined the program he says that his life has improved, especially because he has been able to consistently feed his family. With the profits from the coming harvesting season, Simon plans to buy a cow.

Between the nine farmers in Simon's Group, a total of five acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light so, with this loan, the group will also receive a total of four solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize

loans.name: Beatrice's Group

texts.en:
Beatrice's Group is formed by 14 farmers in Butere District and is being represented by Beatrice, who is the group leader pictured above. She is 32 years old, married, and has three children. Beatrice has been a farmer for ten years and is often referred to as a very hard-working individual.

Beatrice isn’t new to One Acre Fund, she actually joined the program in 2012 and has since noticed her life has changed, especially in the sense that she has been able to consistently feed her family. This year, Beatrice will not only get fertilizer and maize seeds as part of her loan, but she will also purchase a solar light. She is very excited about this addition since now she will be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and, therefore, save more money.

Using this loan, Beatrice's Group will purchase a total of ten solar lights and use the farming inputs received to plant a total of 7.25 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light, as well as hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Yolanda

texts.en:
Yolanda is 51 years old and has seven children. Yolanda is married and has two children who are in school.

Yolanda is in the agricultural business, farming rice in the Philippines.  She requested a PHP 7,000 loan through NWTF to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.  Yolanda has been farming rice for seven years now, and has borrowed 13 times in the past from NWTF to sustain it.

In the future, Yolanda would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers and other farm supplies.

loans.name: Maruf

texts.ru: Маъруф жизнерадостный молодой парень 21 года. Он женат, но пока не имеет своих детей. У Маъруфа нет высшего образования, так каК у его семьи небыло возможности оплатить высшее учебное заведение за его учебу. Маъруф  живет со своей молодой женой в Гиссаре.  Он занимается своим бизнесом. Он продает обувь и имеет тем самым доход на пропитание. Сейчас Маъруф хочет получить кредит для расширения своего бизнеса. Поэтому он обратился в Арванд за кредитом. Маъруф заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за помощь и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en: Maruf, age 21, is a young man with a positive outlook.  He is married but doesn't have any children yet.  He doesn't have a higher education because his family was never in a position to pay for his studies.  Maruf lives with his young wife in Gissar.  He runs his own business and makes a living selling shoes.  He now wants to get a loan in order to expand his activity.  For this reason, he has turned to Kiva's partner MDO Arvand for a loan.  He thanks them in advance for their support and is looking forward to a positive outlook.

loans.use: to buy shoes for resale.

loans.name: Nawodi Group

texts.fr: Nawodi est un groupe de 5 femmes qui prennent le crédit à ACFIME depuis novembre 2012. Ces femmes font diverses activités mais Salimata, emprunteur représentatif vend de la bouillie faite à base de petit mil.Elle est mariée, mère de 4 enfants tous scolarisés. Avec ce crédit, Satimata aimerait acheter 5 sacs de petit mil à raison de 120 000 francs CFA et le reste de l'argent servirait à payer du sucre, du tamarin, du gemgembre, les autres épices et du bois pour la cuisson. la bouilli du petit mil est très nutritif et est très consommé au Burkina les matins. Le groupe de Salimata fait des remboursements à l'échéance. Avec le bénéfice, cette brave dame voudrait continuer son activité et pourvoir à certains besoins de sa famille.
texts.en:
The Nawodi group is made up of five people who have been taking out loans with ACFIME since November, 2012. They work in different areas, but Salimata, the featured borrower, works selling porridge made from small millet. She is married and a mother of four children, who all attend school.

With this loan, Salimata would like to buy five sacs of small millet for 120,000 francs, and then use the rest of her loan to buy sugar, tamarind, ginger, and other spices. She will also buy wood to use during the cooking.

Porridge made from small millet is very nutritious and is eaten in Burkina Faso in the mornings. Salimata's group makes regular repayments on their loan. 

With her earnings, this brave woman would like to continue her business and take care of her family.

loans.use: to buy millet to make porridge

loans.name: Firdavs

texts.ru: Фирдавс жизнерадостный молодой человек в возрасте 25 лет. Он еще не женат. Фирдавс имеет высшее образование, но в данный момент занимается развозкой пассажиров. Ему нравится его работа. От данного дела Фирдас имеет неплохой доход. В данный момент Фирдавс хочет получить кредит для ремонта своего автомобиля. За помощью он обратился в МДО Арванд. Фирдавс заранее благодарит МДО Арванд за поддержку и надеется на положительный результат.
texts.en: Firdavs, age 25, is a young man with a positive outlook.  He is not married yet.  Although he has a higher education, he is currently working as a taxi driver.  He likes his job, and he makes a decent salary from this activity.  At the moment, he would like to receive a loan in order to repair his car.  He has turned to MDO Arvand for some support.  Firdavs thanks MDO Arvand in advance for their support, and he is looking forward to a positive outcome.

loans.use: to buy spare parts of his taxi.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy mobile accessories for her son's mobile shop.

loans.name: Ali

texts.en:
Ali is an artisan from Ghana who specializes in hand-carved wood masks. He would like to invest in a purchase of supplies and raw materials, including beads, wood, paint, sandpaper, nails and polish.

Ali has been selling through NOVICA since 2012. This is his story:

"It is my curiosity that has guided me in learning this art and honing my skills. I got interested in wood carving when I was a child, when I used to visit my brother Salihu's workshop. I would go to his workshop when I returned from school and try my hands at sanding masks. When I completed junior high school, my parents could not further my education and so I joined Salihu at his workshop. I got paid for the work I did, which I saved to be able to buy my own tools. After 12 years of working with my brother I started to work on my own. I have taught other carvers, and currently have four carvers working with me. I love the art of mixing colors and fixing aluminum plates to design an item. My hope is to become successful and be able to assist several people who cannot further their education due to financial constraints."

"I thank you for this opportunity. The microcredit will help me to improve the quality of my pieces and craft new designs."

Use the link below to view Ali's hand-carved wood masks on the NOVICA site:
http://www.novica.com/kiva/8473

loans.use: to invest in a purchase of supplies and raw materials for his wood masks

loans.name: Juan Bautista

texts.es: Juan vive en casa propia con su grupo familiar, el se dedica a la pesca artesanal desde hace 25 años experiencia que le ha dado la oportunidad de vender una buena calidad de producto por esa razón posee clientes fijos, Juan esta solicitando un crédito ya que necesita comprar las herramientas necesarias para continuar con su trabajo como: trasmallos, redes y darle mantenimiento a la lancha que muestra en la fotografía ya que esa es su única fuente de trabajo y de ingresos.
texts.en: Juan lives at home with his family. He has done artisanal fishing for 25 year, which has given him the opportunity to sell a good quality product. Because of this, he has regular customers. Juan is requesting a loan to purchase the necessary tools to continue his work: trammel nets and servicing his boat, shown in the photograph, because that is his only source of employment and income.

loans.use: to purchase a trammel net and repair the boat.

loans.name: Yenny Marisol

texts.es:
En la ciudad de Portoviejo, capital de Manabí conocida desde hace muchos años  como la ciudad de los reales tamarindos, se reúnen cada quince días  las socias del Grupo de Crédito Luz De América,
En este lugar vive la señora Yenny, tiene 45 años de edad, mantiene una relación de unión libre y de esta relación tiene tres  hijos mayores de edad que aún viven en su casa. Su esposo es albañil.
Doña Yenny se dedica a la venta de  comida rápida en su casa lugar en el cual todas las tardes instala su negocio, allí venden hamburguesas, papas fritas, sodas, jugos y batidos de frutas entre otras cosas, su hija le ayuda en el negocio, ella también es consultora de Belcorp (artículos de belleza, cosméticos perfumería y accesorios para damas), trabaja todos los días en la mañana realizando sus  recorridos y en las tardes vende sus alimentos , así ella se gana la vida honradamente, ya son más de 20 años con este negocio el cual es su vida.
Este crédito lo va emplear en comprar víveres para preparar los alimentos y productos Belcorp. Lleva 6 años  en el Grupo De Crédito y le gusta la ayuda que le brindan los créditos. Sus sueños son seguir adelante.
texts.en:
The members of the "Luz De América" (America's Light) communal bank meet every two weeks in Portoviejo, Manabí's capital.  The area has been known for many years as the city of the true tamarinds. 
This is where señora Yenny lives.  She is 45-years old, married and has three grown children, who still live at home.  Her husband is a bricklayer.  
Doña Yenny makes her living selling fast food.  Every afternoon she sets up her business in her home.  She sells hamburgers, fries, sodas, juices and fruit milkshakes, among other items.  Her daughter helps her with the business.  Doña Yenny is also a Belcorp consultant (beauty supplies, cosmetics, perfumes and women's accessories).  Every morning Doña Yenny does her rounds, and in the afternoons she sells her fast food.  This is how she is able to make an honest living.  She has had her business for more than twenty years, and it is her life. 
This loan is going to be used to purchase supplies for preparing her food and to purchase Belcorp  products.  Doña Yenny has been with her communal bank for six years.  She likes the help provided by the loans.  Her dream is to keep moving forward.

loans.use: to purchase supplies and Belcorp products.

loans.name: Joran

texts.en:
Joran earns a living from selling used shoes in the local market to make a living, with his earnings going toward the education costs of his two children.  He earns a good living from his business, and has been able to improve his business.  

To add to his financial capital, Joran acquired a loan from GDMPC micro credit to buy additional volume of used shoes to meet costumer demand.  He hopes to build a shelter for his store where he would be able to sell his items comfortably.

loans.use: to buy additional volume of used shoes to meet costumer demand.

loans.name: Patrick

texts.en:
Partrick is 32 years old, married and blessed with one child who is 3 1/2 years old. He has been selling kerosene for the last 20 years, and earns a monthly income of 35,000 Kenyan Shillings (KES).
	 		
He has applied for his first loan of 20,000 KES from VisionFund Kenya, and intends to use the loan amount to buy more stock of kerosene to sell to his customers.                                                                                           

Partrick will use the anticipated profits to provide for the family's basic needs. He hopes to grow his business and improve his family standard of living.

loans.use: to purchase kerosene to resell

loans.name: Mahmoud

texts.en: Mahmoud was born in 1988. He is a young single man with seven family members from Marka, Jordan. He has been making ash wood baskets and ash wood trays and selling them in his neighborhood for five years. Now he wants to buy a larger quantity of ash wood and some other materials for making trays and baskets to raise his productivity and income like he did with his previous loan, which helped him to move one step forward. But he doesn't have enough money to do so. Mahmoud has applied for a youth loan.

loans.use: To buy a larger quantity of ash wood for his business making baskets and trays

loans.name: Awurade Beye Group

texts.en:
These three members, led by Amos as the representative, are part of the group called Awurade Beye ("God will provide"). The businesses that the members of this group are engaged in include selling car tyres, assorted materials and fishing nets. They will need a total amount of GHS 7,600 to expand their businesses. The loan will benefit this group of micro-business people, of which Amos is a member. 

Amos says that he joined ID Ghana eight years ago and became a founding member of this group. This is his 14th loan cycle with ID Ghana. He currently has a business selling car tyres. Amos will use his part of this loan, GHS 4200, to increase his capital. He will buy more tyres to sell to customers. He will sell them at the market to his customers. This work allows him to make an income for his family. 

Amos is 56 years old, married and has two dependent children. When asked what he likes about ID Ghana, Amos replied that he likes the health insurance services and the training sessions. He says his loans have made it possible to take care of his children and his needs, by saving part of his profits and reinvesting the other part in his business.

loans.use: to buy more tyres to sell to customers.

loans.name: Nyanyo Kpakpa Group

texts.en:
These women are part of Nyanyo Kpakpa ("good friend") Group and have an average age of 40 years and three children at home. They all live in traditional extended families in Chorkor, Ghana. These women are neighbors who work by buying and selling smoked fish, scarves, sausage, gizzards, slippers and utensils. After successfully repaying their previous loans, these women of the Nyanyo Kpakpa Group are on their eighth loan. 

Naomi is the woman standing second from the right in the photo. She intends to use this loan to buy more sausage and gizzards to sell to customers. She buys her supplies locally at the main market, and makes her sales to diverse clients, both women and men, in cash and often on credit. She hopes to make a very good monthly profit, which she will use for school fees. The rest will be reinvested in her business.

loans.use: To buy more sausage and gizzards to sell to her customers.

loans.name: Hassan's Group

texts.en:
Pictured above is Hassan, who, as a group leader, is representing his group formed by nine farmers in Butere District, Kenya. He is married, is a father to four children, and is known by his community as a very hard-working individual.

Initially, Hassan joined One Acre Fund in 2010 because he wanted to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Since he joined the program, he says that his life has improved, especially because he has been able to consistently feed his family. With the profits from the coming harvest season, Hassan plans to save more money for the future.

Between the nine farmers in Hassan's Group, a total of five acres of land will be planted using the maize seeds and fertilizer received with the loan. Additionally, some of the farmers in the group will be purchasing a solar light, so with this loan, the group will also receive a total of six solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer to improve harvests of maize.

loans.name: Shamigul

texts.ru:
Шамигулу 26 лет. Она замужем за пастуха. У них двое детей. Старшему 6 лет, младшему ребенку 5 лет. Шамигул 3 года как занимается куплей и продажей скота. Она покупает телят, бычков и после определенного дня откорма перепродает их на скотном рынке с наценкой. Таким образом, Шамигул приносит в дом очень важный доход. Соответственно ей помогает ее муж. Шамигул решила обратиться за кредитом, чтобы расширить деятельность и увеличить доход, чтобы накопить денег для образования детей. Скоро ее дети пойдут в школу и им необходимо купить учебники, школьную форму и т.п. для учебы. 
   Для развития бизнеса необходимо увеличить поголовья скота, но надобной суммы денег у нее нет, и Шаъмигул обратилась за кредитом, она надеется, что ей помогут.
texts.en: Shamigul is 26 and married to a livestock herder.  She has two children; her oldest is 6, and her youngest is 5.  For 3 years, Shamigul has dealt in cattle for a living, typically buying cow and bull calves then reselling them at a cattle market for a profit after they've been fattened.  This provides Shamigul and her family with a very important source of income, and her husband helps her accordingly.  Shamigul is seeking a loan to buy more livestock so she can expand her business, increase her income and thus be able to save money for her children's education.  Her children will be starting school soon, and she needs to buy textbooks, uniforms and other school supplies for their studies.  Shamigul needs to have more animals on her farm to grow her business, and hopes she'll get the help she needs.

loans.use: buy cattle for fattening and resale

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to buy various products (Women accessories, shoes, clothes, etc).

loans.name: Emelia

texts.en:
Emelia, 49 years old, is married with one child. She has been farming for many years, and she earns better income from this.

She has repaid successfully her previous loan and is now planning to take a new loan to purchase organic fertilizer to restore farm nutrients to have a productive harvest.

She is now happy to say that with this loan, the entire farm will be fertilized and rest assured will be a productive farm in the future.

loans.use: to purchase organic fertilizer to restore farm nutrients to have a productive harvest.

loans.name: Aime

texts.en:
Aime is 24 with an only child. She is settled for living in Romarate, Aurora, Zamboanga del Sur. Her spouse's occupation is as an Overseas Filipino Worker. She has a cosmetics retailing business, earning good enough for their daily expenditures.

She borrowed a loan from GDMPC Microcredit to purchase construction materials to finish their house construction for safer living. She hopes to improve her business, and after her house construction is done, she would like to build a store for her business.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials to finish their house construction for safer living.

loans.name: Marcel

texts.en:
This is Marcel, who is 33 years old and a resident of Pasay City, Philippines. She is married to Maximo, and they are working hard to provide for their everyday needs and expenses.

Marcel operates a food stall where she sells siomai. Siomai is an Asian delicacy that originated in China.  It is a piece of meat, either chicken, pork or beef, stuffed inside a wonton wrapper and cooked by steaming. Often eaten with lemon or calamansi with a dash of soy sauce, siomai is sold on almost every corner in different cities. 

The siomai business is a good business today.  Filipinos love “pica foods,” or finger food, snacks. It is a mass favorite since it is easy to eat and more importantly it is affordable. Her regular customers are her neighbors and the local community. 

Aside from siomai, she also has siopao, fishballs, kikiam, fries, and other common Filipino street foods. She earns a minimum of PHP 500 in sales every day.

To help her continue operating her business, she is requesting a PHP 10,000 loan. She will use the loan to buy raw ingredients needed in her siomai business. She expects a boost in her business income as she expands her business.

Marcel hopes that her children will have a good life.  That is why she is unwaveringly supporting their educational needs. She meets up with her co-fellowship* members to share stories of their work every week.  It is where she can also draw strength and inspiration from the Word of God she studies.

* All CCT community partners / clients are organized into fellowship groups that meet on a weekly basis. A fellowship group is composed of 15 to 30 community partners. The fellowship groups gather each week to study the Word of God, build social capital, and repay Micro Finance loans.

loans.use: To pay for raw ingredients she needs in her siomai business.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase many pipes for resale in order to earn more

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa is 39 years old and married. She runs a general store in the Philippines and works very hard to provide for her needs. She has been in this business for 13 years. 

Elisa has requested a loan of 15,000 Philippine pesos through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation. She will use the loan to buy items to sell, like shampoo, soap and canned goods. 

In the future, Elisa would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy items to sell, like shampoo, soap and canned goods.

loans.name: Elisa

texts.en:
Elisa has five children. She is a very hard working entrepreneur. Elisa is 48 years old and two of her children are in school.

Elisa has a fish vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 6,000 loan through NWTF to buy additional boxes of fish to sell.

Elisa has been in this business for 28 years.  In the future, she would like to save enough money so she can afford to send her children to college.

loans.use: to buy additional boxes of fish to sell

loans.name: Ma. Juliet

texts.en:
Ma. Juliet is 31 years old and has one child. She is a very hard working entrepreneur, she has a food vending business in the Philippines for three years and is requesting a PHP 6000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her enterprise. 

 In the future, Ma. Juliet would like to save enough money to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Stanley's Group

texts.en:
Stanley is 26 years old and is often described as a very hard-working individual. He has two children and is married. As a group leader, Stanley is representing his group of six farmers in Butere District, in Kenya, and he is very excited to be working with One Acre Fund for the first time this year.

The decision to join One Acre Fund was largely a result of Stanley's desire to earn enough money to feed his family. Apart from receiving farming inputs, he is also purchasing a solar light as part of his loan, which is very exciting to him since he will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and, therefore, save more money. With the profits that he gains from this year’s harvest, he plans to invest in a business.

Stanley and his group will receive a total of six solar lights as well as input loans of maize and fertilizer to plant a total of two acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient, hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a new wheel for her husband's truck

loans.name: Erind

texts.en:
Erind is 27 and a married father of two, a 4- and a 2-year-old. He wants to invest in two dairy cows and repair a damaged animal stable.

”[It] has already started snowing and my animals live under unhealthy conditions and repairing their stable is [a matter of] urgency,” said Erind. 

His plans are that he makes it a little livestock farm. Currently, he’s got two cows and sells raw milk and baby calves to the local market. He owns 3 dynym (a dynym is equal to 1,000 square meters) of agricultural land and has rented from some villagers 10 more dynym of land; so all in all, he’s got 13 dynym of land where he plants in quantities corn, wheat and seasonal veggies. The clientele are residents of a nearby city.

loans.use: to invest in two dairy cows and repair a damaged stable.

loans.name: Esther's Group

texts.en:
Esther is 48 years old and has 6 children. She is a group leader and is representing her group of 11 farmers in Butere District, Kenya for a loan.

Esther has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2010. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Although she described her last harvest as very good, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Esther also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and, therefore, save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Esther's Group will be able to receive a total of 10 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 5.5 acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to repair and plaster his room.

loans.name: Leidy Carolina

texts.es:
Leidy es un joven muy emprendedora y creativa de tan solo 19 años de edad, picara y sonriente que tiene una tienda de misceláneas la cual empelo pro necesidad económica por motivos que no quiso describir pues no quiere generar lastima, solo quiere un apoyo para mejorar su empresa y salir adelante junto con su familia. 
Solicita un crédito el cual invertirá en la compra de productos como cosméticos, snaks, lociones y productos de papelería.
Todos estos productos son nuevos para su negocio y aspira atraer muchos clientes, incrementar su utilidad, darle sostenibilidad a su negocio y en un futuro poder comprar una vivienda propia que es su gran propósito.
texts.en:
Leidy is a very enterprising and creative young woman of just 19 years of age who is bold and smiley. She has a corner shop which she set up out of financial need. She did not want to elaborate why as she doesn't want to incite pity, she just wants a hand to improve her business and move forward with her family. 

Leidy is applying for a loan to use for the purchase of products such as cosmetics, snacks, lotions and stationery items, all of which will be new products for her business. She hopes to attract many customers, increase her store's usefulness and make her business sustainable so that in the future she can buy her own home, which is her biggest dream.

loans.use: to begin selling new products in her store such as cosmetics, snacks, lotions and stationery items.

loans.name: Ines Bety

texts.es: A sus 53 años de edad Ines  es una señora alegre,ella vive con su esposo, 2 hijos y una nieta,  su hijo tiene  18 años y está estudiando para obtener la licencia  de conducir, una hija de 24 años que es madre soltera y una nieta de 3 años, su esposo trabaja en la agricultura,  Ines se dedica a la agricultura y a la crianza de cuyes, y el crédito lo va a  invertir en la compra de cuyes con la finalidad de mejorar su negocio, lo que Ines  espera es seguir adelante con la crianza de cuyes para mejorar sus ingresos y de ahí poder  apoyarle a su hijo en sus estudios y en todo lo que necesiten su hija.
texts.en:
At her 53 years of age, Ines is a happy woman who lives with her spouse, 2 children, and granddaughter. Her 18 years old son is to obtain a license as a professional chauffeur. Her 24 year old daughter is a single mother of a daughter who is currently 3 years old. Her husband works in agriculture.
Ines makes a living in farming and the raising of guinea pigs. She will invest the loan in the purchase of guinea pigs in order to improve her business. She hopes to continue on with raising cuyes to improve her incomes and through that be able to support her son in his studies and also with whatever her daughter and granddaughter need.

loans.use: purchase guinea pigs.

loans.name: Maria

texts.en:
Maria is a widowed woman with five children. She is a very hardworking entrepreneur. She is 46 years old and has one child in school.

Maria has a food vending business in the Philippines. She requested a PHP 5,000 loan amount through NWTF to buy ingredients for her food production business.

Maria has been in this business for two years. In the future, she would like to save enough to provide a secure future for her family.

loans.use: to buy ingredients for her food production business

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy chickens for fattening, concentrate, and medicine.

loans.name: Phanice's Group

texts.en:
Phanice is a 36-year-old proud mother of five children. She is a group leader, often described as a very trustworthy person, and is representing her group of 10 farmers in Webuye District. Since joining One Acre Fund in 2013, Phanice has noticed that she has had more profits from each harvest.

Phanice described her harvest as excellent last year, but believes she can have a better one this year by continuing to work with One Acre Fund. She is very excited to also be purchasing a solar light, apart from fertilizer and maize, because she will now be able to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money. With the profits from this season’s harvest, she plans to send her children to school.

With this loan, Phanice’s Group will be able to plant a total of 5.5 acres of land and purchase a total of nine solar lights.

loans.use: to purchase hybrid seeds and fertilizer for the cultivation of maize, as well as a solar light.

loans.name: Eunice's Group

texts.en:
Eunice is 64 years old and has six children. She is a group leader and is representing her group, formed by six farmers in Butere District, Kenya.

Eunice has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2011. This decision was largely a result of her desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Although she described her last harvest as poor due to bad weather conditions, she believes she could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Eunice also decided to purchase a solar light as part of her loan, which she is very excited about, as it will allow her to reduce the consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Eunice's Group will be able to receive a total of two solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of four acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Francisco

texts.es: Francisco o Pancho como le gusta que le llamen es una persona casada desde hace 25 años que tiene dos hijos y vive en la comunidad Akerana en una casa de adobe que si bien es modesta, es de su propiedad y tiene tanto luz como agua Pancho es agricultor y albañil y quiere un credito para comprar una vaca pequeña para incrementar su ganado, su esposa le ayuda cuidando a los animales. Pancho goza de buena salud y tiene una predisposición admirable para el duro trabajo en el campo, él espera que puedan ayudarle
texts.en: Francisco, or Pancho as he likes to be called, has been married for 25 years, has two children and lives in the Akerana community in an adobe house which is rather modest. It is his property and it has electricity and running water. Pancho is a farmer and bricklayer and wants a loan to purchase a small cow to increase his herd. His wife helps with taking care of the animals. Pancho enjoys good health and has an admirable disposition for the hard work of the countryside. He hopes that you can help him.

loans.use: to purchase a small cow.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy clay, paint and varnish.

loans.name: La Esperanza Group

texts.es:
