El grupo La Esperanza está en empezando a trabajar, cada una tiene la expectativa de poder capacitarse y ayudar a sus familias y a sus seres queridos. Ellas además están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación, para poder ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Celestina quien se dedica a la venta de todo tipo de productos en su propia despensa. Comenta que por medio de su esfuerzo y sacrificio pudo formar su negocio, en el cual le esta yendo muy buen.
La Sra. Celestina con este préstamo para poder comprar azúcar, fideos, carne, leche, panificados, arroz, bebidas, aceite, remedios, tomate, cebolla, papas, carbón, etc, para poder surtir su despensa y poder seguir con sus ventas.
texts.en:
The group La Esperanza is starting to work. Each member expects to be able to get trained and help their families and loved ones. They are also doing the poverty elimination questionnaire in order to improve their quality of life.

One of the members is Celestina, who makes her living selling all types of products in her own small store. She says that because of her effort and sacrifice, she was able to start her business, which is going very well for her.

With this loan, Celestina will buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, baked goods, rice, drinks, oil, medicines, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, charcoal, etc., in order to stock her store and be able to continue with her sales.

loans.use: to buy sugar, noodles, meat, milk, baked goods, rice, drinks, oil, medicines, tomatoes, onions, potatoes, charcoal, etc.

loans.name: Nargiz

texts.ru:
Ее зовут Наргиз. Она замужем и имеет троих детей. Ей 33 года. Ее дети учатся в школе. Дочери 13 лет, сыновьям 10 и 6 лет. Наргиз трудолюбивая и очень хорошая женщина. Наргиз всегда работает и старается во благо семьи и детей. Ниргиз уже 5 лет занимается шитьем женской одежды на заказ. Она берез заказы на шитье у себя дома. Для нее такая работа очень удобная, потому что она может одновременно заниматься домашними делами и зарабатывать деньги. Наргиз научалась шить у своей мамы. И по сей день использует ее советы в процессе работы. 
  Причина, по которой Наргиз обратилась за кредитом, является купля необходимых швейных принадлежностей. Для нее сейчас рабочие материалы очень необходимы и Наргиз надеется на помощь с Вашей стороны, чтобы купить их.
texts.en:
Meet Nargiz.  She is 33 years old, married, and the mother of three children who all go to school.  She has a 13-year-old daughter and two sons, ages 10 and 6.  Nargiz is a very good and hardworking woman. She always works hard and does everything she can to provide the best to her family and children.  For the past five years already, she has been taking orders and sewing women's clothes at home.  She finds this job to be very convenient because it allows her to take care of the household chores and at the same time make a living.  Nargiz learned to sew from her mother.  To this day, she still follows her mom's advice when she sews.

The reason why Nargiz has requested a loan is to buy the sewing supplies that she needs.  At the moment she really needs to buy supplies for her work, and she is hoping to receive your support so that she can buy them.

loans.use: to buy sewing supplies.

loans.name: Maisha Zakhem Group

texts.en:
Azizi, who is in his early 20s, is divorced with three children. One of them is still in school, and the other two are still too small. 

He has been running a business of selling roasted maize and maize flour for seven years now. He works from 4 a.m. to 4 p.m. daily and is able to make a small monthly profit.

This will be Azizi's second loan from Tujijenge Tanzania. He used the previous loan to increase on the maize grain stock. He has paid back his loan successfully. He used the profit to pay school fees, bought bricks and covered household expenses. He will use this loan to buy more maize grains for his business. He dreams of building his own house.

Azizi will share this loan with his loan group "Maisha Zakhem" which has two members who will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan.

loans.use: to buy more maize grains for his business.

loans.name: Malumbo Group

texts.en:
Mwajuma was born in 1955. She is married and the mother of five children. One child is in school, and the rest are grown. She is known for being a businesswoman trying to achieve a better future through her business. Despite having little education, she has faced the challenges of running a business for five years without getting discouraged. Her business has helped her family to avoid financial problems. She runs a barbershop and has a young man as a business helper. Her business operates 6 am to 11 pm daily and is able to make a fair monthly profit. 

From Tujijenge Tanzania, this is her eighth loan request, which will be apportioned among Malumbo Group's three members. The group members will hold each other accountable for paying back the loan. In the coming years, Mwajuma would like to manage a classic barbershop. With her previous loans, which have been repaid, she bought aluminum doors, shaving machines, nice lights, and a sofa. The business profit covered part of her child's school fees and household expenses. Mwajuma will use her new loan to renovate her barbershop with new equipment and carpet.

loans.use: to renovate her barbershop with new equipment and carpet.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy ingredients to prepare food, such as vegetables and meat.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to build a wall around her house which will provide security and peace of mind, as the area has a high crime rate.

loans.name: Kanoat

texts.en:
Kanoat was born in 1958. She is married and has five children. She always tries for the well-being of her children. Kanoat is an honest and hard-working woman. 

For more than ten years, Kanoat has been busy growing agricultural products. She owns land. She mainly grows onions and maize. Her husband helps her to grow crops and vegetables. Kanoat sells the season's harvest in a local market. She has additional income from animal husbandry. 

Kanoat is asking for a loan of USD 1,500 to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer for sowing. She awaits your mercy.

loans.use: to buy seeds and mineral fertilizer for sowing.

loans.name: Peruth

texts.en:
Peruth is 26 years old. She is married with two children aged two and five, who do not yet go to school. She sells foodstuffs and has been in this business for four years. She has two employees. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more beans and maize for resale. The profits from the business will be used to renovate her house and reinvest.

loans.use: To buy more beans and maize for resale.

loans.name: Filomene

texts.en:
Filomene is 32 years old. She is married with 2 children aged between 1 and 6 years, and one of them goes to school. She sells food stuffs and has been farming for the past 4 years. 

With the loan, she would like to buy more sorghum and maize to sell. The profits from the business will be used to reinvest and buy food for home consumption.

loans.use: To buy more sorghum and maize to sell

loans.name: Jose Nicolas

texts.es:
Jose es un campesino, humilde y trabajador con el empuje y verraquera que distingue a los hombres y mujeres del campo.

Es un Hombre de mente emprendedora y desde muy pequeño aprendió todos los oficios del campo como cultivos y crianza de animales, tanto así que hoy en día tiene su propio cultivo de papa y lechuga; alimentos que vende en la plaza de mercado del municipio de El Carmen De Viboral, Antioquia.

Este personaje tiene como propósito aumentar sus cultivos y mejorar los que actualmente tiene y es por eso que acude a la ayuda de un crédito para la compra de insumos agropecuarios como fertilizantes y la compra de semillas de papa.

El préstamo le dará la oportunidad de progresar como empresario y como persona, además de aumentar sus ingresos y seguir aportando el sustento en su hogar.

Él lo único que quiere es poder mejorar la calidad de vida de él y su familia.
texts.en:
Jose is a farmer. He is a simple and hardworking person, whose persistence and strong spirit are typical characteristics of men and women from the countryside.

He is an enterprising man who learned everything there was to know about farming, such as growing crops and raising animals. In fact, he has his own potato and lettuce plantations, and sells his produce at the local marketplace in El Carmen de Viboral, Antioquia department.

Jose's goal is to expand his plantations and improve the ones he has now. This is why he is requesting a loan to buy agricultural supplies such as fertilizers and potato seeds. With this loan, he will be able to get ahead, as an entrepreneur and as a person. With a higher income, he will be able to continue supporting his family. The only thing he wants is to be able to improve his and his family’s living conditions.

loans.use: to buy agricultural supplies, such as fertilizers and potato seeds.

loans.name: Carmita Zulai

texts.es: Carmita tiene 51 años de edad, ella es casada y tiene 3 hijos que ya son mayores de edad y ya saben trabajar, pero uno de ellos está estudiando, Carmita se dedica a la crianza de ganado  desde que  era muy joven, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de una vaca para aumentar en su negocio, el esposo de Carmita se dedica a la agricultura y a la ganadería, la aspiración de Carmita es de trabajar en su negocio y así mejorar sus ingresos para poder darle el estudio a su hijo.
texts.en: Carmita is 51 years old. She is married and has three children who are already adults and have learned to work, but one of them is in school. Carmita has raised livestock since she was very young. She is going to invest the loan in the purchase of a cow to expand her business. Her husband works in agriculture and livestock-raising. Carmita's hope is to work in her business and thus improve her income in order to be able to give her son an education.

loans.use: to buy a cow

loans.name: Jonathan David

texts.es: David es un joven trabajador, tiene 21 años de edad, vive con sus padres y se dedica a la albañilería y a la crianza de animales menores, comenta que estas actividades las aprendió de sus padres ya que su madre se dedica a criar chanchos y su padre es albañil, el crédito lo va a invertir en la compra chanchos para criarlos en un lugar que le hace tener su abuelita ya que David vive arrendando y en esta casa no le permiten criar animales, lo que David aspira es comprar mas chanchos para mejorar su negocio y por ende sus ingresos para de aquí cubrir los gastos que implica ingresar a la universidad, que estudiar es lo que mas desea.
texts.en: David is a hardworking young man. He is 21 years old and lives with his parents. He works in construction and raising small animals. He learned these businesses from his parents since his mother works raising pigs and his father is a builder. He is going to invest the loan in the purchase of pigs to raise them in a place provided by his grandmother because David is renting and in this house they do not allow raising animals. David aspires to buy more pigs in order to improve his business and consequently his earnings to cover the expenses of enrolling in university since studying is what he wants most.

loans.use: to buy pigs

loans.name: Leonela Maura

texts.es:
LEONELA. Por segunda ocasión tramita un crédito en FODEMI, ella tiene 23 años y vive en La Tola con su hijo de 3 años y uno de sus hermanos.
LEONELA es madre abandonada y en vista que no existen fuentes de trabajo, pensó en poner una tienda de alimentos. Ella improviso en su casa un espacio para este negocio.
Su hijo está en la escuela y goza de buena salud.
Con el crédito anterior compró mercadería para su tienda y ahora con este nuevo crédito. Piensa abastecerse de más mercadería e implementar la venta de carnes, yogurth y embutidos.
Agradece mucho a FODEMI por ser la empresa que  ayuda a trabajar y hacer crecer los negocios. Ella espera en un tiempo de 3 años tener su tienda mucho más grande y poder satisfacer las necesidades de sus clientes.

LEONELA se encuentra con su hijo en brazos.
texts.en:
This is the second time that Leonela is requesting a loan with FODEMI. She is 23 years old and lives in La Tola with her 3 year-old son and one of her brothers. Her son is in school and in good health. Leonela is an abandoned mother. Because there are no sources of employment, she thought of putting together a grocery store. She improvised, using her house as a space for this business. 

With the previous loan, she purchased merchandise for her store. Now, with this new loan, she is thinking of stocking up on more merchandise and introducing yogurt, sausage, and other meat sales. She is very grateful for FODEMI for being the company that helps her work and grow her business. Within three years, she hopes to have a much larger store and be able to meet the needs of her customers.

Leonela can be found with her son in her arms.

loans.use: to purchase basic goods for her store and to introduce yogurt, sausage, and other meat sales

loans.name: Jairus's Group

texts.en:
Jairus is 61 years old and has 7 children. He is a group leader and is representing his group formed of 15 farmers in Butere District, Kenya. 

Jairus has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2010. This decision was largely a result of his desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods; and although he described his last harvest as good, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. Jairus also decided to purchase two solar lights as part of his loan, which he is very excited about, as it will allow him to reduce his consumption of paraffin fuel and therefore save more money.

Obtaining this loan means that Jairus's Group will be able to receive a total of 16 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of 8.75 acres.

loans.use: to purchase two solar lights and gain access to cost efficient hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: San Juan 2 Group

texts.es:
El grupo San Juan 2está en su ciclo número 4 del programa de comité de mujeres, donde todas trabajan y se ayudan por salir adelante. Están haciendo la encuesta de eliminación de pobreza, ya que a traves de este podrán conocer la situacion de cada una y conforme a ello poder trabajar.
Una de las integrantes es la Sra. Maria quien en su última encuesta mostro un nivel de pobreza dentro del nivel  dos. A través del esfuerzo y el trabajo continuo y la aplicaciones de los comportamientos vitales de una mujer exitosa, ella se encuentra mejorando su situación de pobreza, pero igualmente está consciente de que este trabajo podrá seguir mejorando, es por ello que se dedica a la venta de empanadas, comidas,  y otros.
La Sra. Maria de este crédito para la compra de verduras, Carne, Huevo y otros, lo que le ayudará  a la misma a obtener más producción y mas venta el cual le ayudará a mejorar sus ingresos
texts.en:
The group “San Juan 2” is in its fourth loan cycle with the Women’s Committee Program. All of the members are working and helping one another move forward. They have taken the poverty elimination survey so that they can become familiar with their situations and integrate that knowledge into their work.

One of the members is Sra. Maria, whose latest survey indicated that she was at a Stage 2 poverty level. Through her efforts and continuous work, as well as by applying the vital behaviors of a successful woman, Maria will be able to improve her poverty situation. She is also aware that her work will continue to improve. Maria sells empanadas, meals, and other items.

She is requesting a loan in order to buy vegetables, meat, eggs, and other supplies that will help her to increase production and make more sales. All of this will help to improve her income.

loans.use: to buy vegetables, meat, eggs, and other supplies.

loans.name: Abdoulaye

texts.fr:
Le client Abdoulaye, est un nouveau client qui n’a jamais bénéficié de crédit à l’IMCEC. C’est pour régler un besoin latent qu’il s’est tourné vers l'IMCEC. 
Il est marié et père d’un garçon de 2 ans seulement et voyant qu’à cette âge, les enfants sont très mobiles et que la fausse des toilettes de la maison sont délabrés, il vient solliciter ce crédit afin de faire la réfection les lieux.
Abdoulaye est un enseignant qui exerce le métier depuis plus de 7 ans. Il travaille de 8h à 15h et le reste de son temps, il fait des consultations par rapport à un don de guérison qu’il a reçu.
Abdoulaye possède des terres dont il rêve d’exploiter un jour pour en faire un verger. Il aimerait aussi faire du transport un jour.
texts.en:
A new client of UIMCEC,  Abdoulaye has never before benefited from a loan from UIMCEC. He has turned to UIMCEC in order to take care of a latent need. 

He is married and the father of one son of just two years old, and at that age children are very mobile. Since the pit for their household toilet is in bad condition, Abdoulaye has come to request a loan in order to renovate it. 

Abdoulaye is a teacher who has been teaching for more than seven years. He works from 8 AM to 3 PM and he uses the rest of his time to do consultations relative to a gift of healing he has received. 

Abdoulaye has some land that he dreams of putting into cultivation one day to make an orchard. He would also like to do transport one of these days.

loans.use: to redo the toilet in his house

loans.name: Dolores

texts.en:
Dolores is 58 years old and a single woman. She works hard to sustain her needs.

Dolores has a food vending business in the Philippines. She has requested a 6000 PHP loan through Negros Women for Tomorrow Foundation to buy more ingredients for her business. Dolores has been a food vendor for 5 years. In the future, Dolores would like to save money to expand her business.

.

loans.use: to buy more ingredients for her food vending business.

loans.name: William

texts.es: William, tiene la edad  de 41 años, esta casado, vive con sus dos hijos y la esposa que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de dos novillas para aumentar el numero de animales, el cuenta con tres novillas en su poder , además de aprovechar unos potreros que tiene para alimentar los animales y con obtener  ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia y también invertir un poco más en el área de cultivo y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
William is 41 years old. He is married, and he lives with his two children and his wife, who are his priority. 

He'll use the loan to buy two heifers to increase the number of animals. He already has three heifers. He'll also use the pastureland he owns to feed the animals.  He'll make a profit and he'll be able to improve his family's life. He will also use the loan to invest in the crops and to achieve some goals. 

This is the first loan he gets from FUDECOSUR. He has never gotten a loan from a state bank before. FUDECOSUR has offered him good terms and a lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy two heifers.

loans.name: Sarah

texts.en:
Sarah is a smallholder farmer based in Eldoret, Kenya, which is a town near the famous Rift Valley. Sarah and her husband are blessed with a child. Sarah has been a farmer for more than 4 years. She keeps poultry for eggs and grows tea and vegetables for sale. She also holds a day job and engages in small businesses on the side whenever an opportunity crosses her path. Despite the rapid fluctuation of prices in the market, Sarah is very passionate and optimistic about the future of farming in Kenya. 

Sarah is seeking a loan to expand her farm. She intends to buy good quality seeds and fertilizer. This move is quite a big deal for her. With a loan, Sarah seeks to continue growing a variety of crops but on a greater scale. The demand for vegetables and other greens in Eldoret and other parts of the country is very high. Income from this venture will negate the high farming expenses she has to deal with currently.

In the long run, with increased income, she will finally be able to satisfy her family’s basic needs. She stated, “In the future, I will be able to provide food for my family and also educate my child.”

loans.use: to expand her farm business by purchasing good quality seeds and fertilizer.

loans.name: Vincent

texts.en:
Vincent sells shoes in Hoima Uganda. He is aged forty-one, married with three children and all attend school. He has always wanted to expand and develop his business.

As inadequate capital is his main challenge. He will use the loan facility to buy coffee to sell.

loans.use: to buy coffee to sell.

loans.name: Hernan Antonio

texts.es:
Hernán de 50 años de edad, se ha ganado el cariño de todos sus vecinos por su amabilidad y buen sentido del humor. 

Ama su familia, la cual es el motor principal para luchar cada día y generar el sustento para sobrevivir. 

Aunque no contaba con recursos para iniciar su negocio, esto no fue impedimento para cumplir su sueño de convertirse en comerciante, con un pequeño capital que le prestó un amigo, este hombre inició con una tienda de abarrotes. Esta actividad la realiza desde hace 4 años.

Sus sueños no paran, por esta razón se encuentra solicitando un crédito que invertirá en la compra de surtido de productos básicos de la canasta familiar. 

Espera poder mejorar su condición económica y poder tener una vejez sin preocupaciones monetarias,  garantizarle a su familia un mejor futuro.
texts.en:
Hernán is 50 years old and he has gained the affection of his neighbors because he is very friendly and has a good sense of humor.

He loves his family, who are the main inspiration behind his efforts to earn a living.

Even though he did not have many resources to begin his business, this did not stand in the way of him becoming a self-employed businessman. With a little investment from a friend, he opened a general store. He has been running his business for 4 years.

His dreams have not diminished and so he is asking for a loan to invest in purchasing more inventory for his store.

He hopes to improve the economic conditions of his family and to have an old age free of money problems and to guarantee his family a better future.

loans.use: to buy basic goods to fill his grocery store

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy more maize and beans to sell.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es:
Desde los años 80 Luís inicio su propio negocio de servicios de guadañadora, convirtiéndose en esa época en algo muy parecido a un jardinero pero este se dedicaba a rapar grandes prados con el equipo de jardineria que se puede observar en la foto.
Es un hombre de 66 años de edad con un feliz matrimonio y un hijo ya mayor de edad, este hombre solo tiene de su negocio y con este ha podido hacerse cargo de su familia y como no cotiza en una pensión sigue trabajando para juntar un ahorro y cuando llegue el momento de parar de trabajar porque su cuerpo no se lo permita quiere tener capital para disfrutar un tranquilo paso del tiempo. 
Solicita un crédito que invertirá en la compra de insumos para la jardinería y actualizar su equipo de trabajo que ya tiene un tiempo de operación largo
texts.en:
Luís started his business, a service of cutting tall grass and weeds, in the 1980’s.  During this time it became something very much like gardening.  However, he devoted himself to cropping large fields with the gardening equipment that can be seen in the photo.

He is a 66 year old man with a happy marriage and one grown child.  This man only has his business.  With this he has been able to be responsible for his family.  As he does not pay into a pension, he continues working in order to get together some savings.  When it comes time to stop working, because his body will no longer allow it, he wants to have capital in order to enjoy a peaceful passage of time.

He is requesting a loan to buy supplies for the gardening business.  He will update his work equipment because he has been working with it for a long time.

loans.use: to buy gardening supplies.

loans.name: Nelson's Group

texts.en:
Nelson is 68 years old and has six children. He is a group leader and is representing his group formed by 15 farmers in Butere District, Kenya. 

Nelson has been farming with One Acre Fund for years now, having joined the program for the first time in 2010. This decision was largely a result of his desire to have access to quality training and acquire new farming methods. Although he described his last harvest as good, he believes he could have a better one this year by continuing to work alongside One Acre Fund. 

Nelson also decided to purchase a solar light as part of his loan, which he is very excited about since it will allow him to have light during the night in order to feel safer.

Obtaining this loan means that Nelson's Group will be able to receive a total of 16 solar lights, as well as farming inputs to plant a total of seven acres.

loans.use: to purchase a solar light and gain access to cost-efficient, hybrid seeds and fertilizer for maize cultivation.

loans.name: Everlides Del Socorro

texts.es:
Everlides es una mujer de campo con empuje y perseverancia, vive con sus cuatro hijos en una humilde finca en zona rural de Puerto Escondido. 

Ella es una madre muy responsable y durante todo este tiempo ha tenido el valor y coraje de sacar a sus hijos adelante junto con su esposo.

Se gana la vida con la cría y producción de animales de engorde y venta de leche, esta actividad la realiza desde hace 21 años con el fin de obtener los recursos suficientes para la manutención de su familia. 

Trabaja todos los días ya que sus animales requieren de aseo, alimentación y monitoreo constante para su correcto desarrollo y posterior venta.

Solicita el préstamo para comprar ganado con el cual podrá mejorar su producción de leche y mejoran sus costos de producción, dándole la oportunidad de tener un negocio más consolidado.

Ella sueña con ver a sus hijos como profesionales y con la mejor educación posible.
texts.en:
Everlides is a countrywoman with drive and perseverance. She lives with her four children on a modest farm in a rural area of Puerto Escondido. She is a very responsible mother, who has always had the bravery and courage to help her children get ahead, together with her husband.

She earns her living by producing and rearing livestock and selling milk. She has done this work for 21 years, with the purpose of earning enough to support her family. She works every day, since her animals require cleaning out, feeding and constant monitorting for their proper development and subsequent sale. 

Everlides is seeking this loan in order to buy cattle, which will help her to improve her milk production and reduce her production costs, giving her the opportunity to consolidate her business. Her dream for the future is to see her children grow up to be professionals, with the best possible education.

loans.use: to buy cattle to improve her milk production

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a widower aged 45 years old. He has two daughters, one is in college and his youngest is in high school. He has been running his Zoona mobile money transfer business for five years. His business provides financial services to the people in his community. 

Richard has accessed three loans from Kiva. The first two loans were for $950 each, which he used to increase the working capital float in his business. This enabled him to service more customers and earn more profits. He has successfully repaid these two loans. He then got a third loan in April, 2014 amounting to $5000. This loan helped him to grow his business, as he was able to purchase five trading booths and open new outlets across the Copperbelt province. He is still making repayments on his third loan. 

Richard is very grateful to Kiva for the loans, they have had a huge impact on his life. He now operates sixteen mobile money outlets across the Copperbelt province of Zambia. His community respects and looks up to him. The business helps him to sustain his family’s needs and pay for his children’s school fees. Richard currently employs fifteen people.

Richard is requesting for a new Kiva loan so that he can increase the working capital float in six of his shops. This will be a short-term loan to help him build his capital across his shops. He will use the money to serve customers on a daily basis. This will help him to earn more profits, as he will be able to serve customers better and continue growing his business.

Richard's goal is to open up more outlets and continue to empower the youth in his community by creating jobs.

loans.use: To build his capital base across his shops so that he can serve more customers in need of financial services

loans.name: Rebeca Marina

texts.es:
Rebeca de 19 años de edad, es soltera y no tiene hijos, estudio hasta bachillerato y vive con su madre y sus hermanos, todos contribuyen a los gastos del hogar.

Rebeca trabaja en su comunidad apoyando la alfabetización de los adultos mayores e impartiendo charlas instructivas los niños de su comunidad ya lleva 6 meses trabajando de esta manera, en sus ratos libres aprende corte y confección, su trabajo queda a 30 minutos a pie desde se casa y su horario es de 8:00 am a 3:00 pm.

El préstamo será utilizado para apoyar a su madre con la construcción de la casa, va a comprar las puertas y las ventanas, Rebeca espera termine la casa antes de fin de año, por el momento viven en una casa provisional, también desea ayudar a sus hermanos a que se gradúen de bachillerato.
texts.en:
Rebeca, who is 19 years old, is single and has no children. She graduated from secondary school and lives with her mother and her siblings. They all contribute to the household expenses.

Rebeca works in her community supporting the literacy of older adults and giving instructive talks to children in her community. She has already been working in this way for six months. In her free time, she is learning dressmaking. Her work is 30 minutes from her house by foot, and her schedule is from 8:00 am to 3:00 pm.

The loan will be used to help her mother with the construction of the house. She is going to buy the doors and the windows. Rebeca hopes to finish the house before the end of the year. For now, they live in temporary housing. She also wants to help her siblings so that they can graduate from secondary school.

loans.use: to buy the doors and the windows for her house.

loans.name: Un Nuevo Inicio Group

texts.es: Un nuevo inicio es un grupo solidario integrado por tres mujeres laboriosas, quien lo coordina es la señora Xiomara de 31 años de edad, casada y madre de dos hijos de las edades de 12 y 16 años, quienes son su motivación de mejorar cada día para que no les haga falta el alimento diario, se dedica a la comercialización de cosméticos AVON y ropa en su comunidad, el crédito lo solicita para invertir en body, perfumes para damas y caballeros, cremas corporales, camisetas, blusas, talladores, etc., una de sus metas es motivar al resto de las integrantes para logran un buen record de pago en la institución. Las otras integrantes son la señora Urania de 50 años de edad, dedica a la comercialización de leche, yoltamal y cabeza de chancho en su comunidad, y por ultimo pero no menos importantes la señora Cecilia de 34 años de edad, quien comercializa ropa nueva de manera ambulante en su comunidad.
texts.en:
"Un Nuevo Inicio"  [A New Begining] is a communal loan group made up of three hardworking women. The coordinator is Xiomara, who is 31 years old. She is married and the mother of two sons who are 12 and 16 years old. They are her motivation for improving each day so that they won't lack for food. She sells Avon cosmetics and clothing in her community. She is requesting the loan to purchase perfumes for women and men, body lotions, t-shirts, blouses, bras, etc. One of her goals is to motivate the other members so they will achieve a good payment record with the institution. 

The other members: Urania, who is 50 years old, sells milk, sweet tamales, and pig heads in her community. Last, but not least, is Cecilia, who is 34 years old. She sells new clothing as a street vendor in her community.

loans.use: to buy cosmetics.

loans.name: Jose

texts.es: Jose, tiene la edad  de 54 años, está casado, vive con la esposa y un hijo  que son su mayor prioridad. Con su crédito pretende hacer la compra de ganado de doble propósito, para leche y cría asi vende la leche y queso y además las crías cuando estén grandes. Con esto  espera obtener un poco de ganancias y así mejorar las condiciones de vida de su familia  y también cumplir algunas metas.  Es el primer  préstamo que  recibido de FUDECOSUR. Él no había tenido antes otros préstamos en bancos estatales, pero FUDECOSUR le ha brindado el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de intereses mucho más baja.
texts.en:
Jose is 54 years old, is married and lives with his wife and a son who are his top priority. With his loan he intends to buy cattle for a dual purpose, for milk and to raise them. In this way he sells the milk and cheese and also the cattle when they are bigger. He hopes to earn some money with this and thus improve his family's living conditions and also achieve a few goals.  

This is the first loan he has received from FUDECOSUR. He hadn't gotten any loans from state banks before, but FUDECOSUR has given him more assistance with the loan and a much lower interest rate.

loans.use: to buy cattle

loans.name: Emmanuel

texts.en: Emmanuel deals in agriculture, mainly growing sugar cane to sell in Hoima, Uganda. He is aged twenty-eight and charged with the responsibility of taking care of two children of ages six and four. He also sells cosmetics so as to earn additional income. He hopes to expand and develop his business though challenged by bad roads that make it difficult and expensive to transport his produce. Emmanuel will use the loan facility to buy more maize to sell.

loans.use: to buy more maize to sell.

loans.name: Manuel

texts.en:
Manuel lives in the town of Masindi, Uganda. He is married with 6 children, and 4 are currently going to school. He operates a retail shop alongside farming to generate side income. 

He has a great dream of building a permanent home even though inadequate capital is a great challenge in his business.

He wants a loan to buy a motorcycle for transport business. The photo was taken from his main business of selling general merchandise.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for his transport business.

loans.name: Johnson

texts.en: Johnson is a 24-year-old married man with one child living in Fort Portal, Uganda. He is a retailer dealing in selling general merchandise and he does farming. He faces the challenges of limited capital and weather changes, especially the rainy seasons, which make roads impassable. Besides that, Johnson hopes to expand his retail business to new areas in order to yield more profits and start up a motorcycle transportation business to increase his incomes. Johnson needs a loan to buy a motorcycle.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle for transport business.

loans.name: Girasol De Monimbó Group

texts.es: Girasol de Monimbó está conformado por cuatro mujeres laboriosas con espíritu de superación, que tomaron la iniciativa de formar un grupo con el objetivo de obtener un financiamiento para aumentar los ingresos y capitalización de sus negocios,  quien lo coordina es la señora Rosa, tiene la edad de 39 años, casada y madre de dos hijos, dependiendo económicamente uno de la edad de dos años, la socia se dedica a la comercialización de gaseosas y helados en su domicilio y en uno de los hospitales de la municipalidad, es primer ciclo que solicita el financiamiento a la institución, para la inversión de gaseosas retornables, gaseosas desechables, gaseosas doce onza, leche, pasas, cocoa, bolsas, etc., una de sus metas es incrementar el negocio por medio de los financiamientos obtenidos en la institución y así mejorar los ingresos adquiridos. El resto de las integrantes son las señoras, Cándida de 37 años de edad, dedicada a la comercialización de ropa nueva en su domicilio desde hace cinco años, Rosa Argentina, quien tiene la edad de 53 años y se dedica a la elaboración de carteras de mano en su domicilio, y Josefa de 35 años de edad comerciante de zapatos desde hace cuatro años.
texts.en:
Girasol de Monimbó is made up of four hardworking women who want to get ahead. They took the initiative of forming a group to obtain financing in order to increase the income from their businesses as well as their investment in the same.

Rosa is the coordinator. She is 39 years old, married, and the mother of two children, one of whom is a two-year-old dependent on her.  She makes a living selling soft drinks and ice cream from her home and also at one of the hospitals in town. This is the first cycle of her loan request to the institution. She will invest in returnable-bottle soft drinks, disposable-bottle soft drinks, 12-ounce soft drinks, milk, raisins, cocoa, bags, etc. 

One of her goals is to expand the business through the loans obtained from the institution and thus generate better income.

The other group members are Candida, 37 years old, who has been selling new clothes from her home for five years; Rosa Argentina, 53 years old, who makes handbags in her own home; and Josefa, 35 years old, who has been a shoe merchant for four years.

loans.use: to buy soft drinks, milk, raisins, cocoa, bags, etc.

loans.name: Tansyk

texts.ru: Тансык 57 лет, вдова, мать 2 детей, уже есть 3 внуков. У Тансык - среднее образование, в качестве основного дохода для своей семьи, занимается животноводством и полеводством, стартовав 30 лет назад. Благодаря упорному труду Тансык, в ее хозяйстве на сегодняшний день имеется 1 корова, а на участке, мерою 1,39 ГА она выращивает пшеницу, ячмень и кукурузу для внутрихозяйственного потребления и реализации. Доходы от бизнеса очень малы и их не хватает на достойную жизнь Тансык, а ей так хочется иметь возможность помогать воспитывать внуков. В целях дальнейшего развития своего хозяйства, Тансык обратилась в Банк «Бай –Тушум» за кредитом в сумме 50,000 сом (KGS) на покупку 8 овец для откорма и реализации. Доходы от кредита Тансык планирует вложить в дальнейшее приумножение количества домашней скотины, чтобы иметь возможность улучшить свое материальное состояние.
texts.en: Tansyk is 57, widowed, and has two children and three grandchildren. She has a high school education and has raised livestock and planted crops as the main source of income for her family for 30 years. Thanks to her hard work, she currently has a cow and a 1.39 hectare plot of land where she grows wheat, barley, and corn for personal use and sales. The income from her business is very small and is not enough for her to live decently. She would also like to be able to help raise her grandchildren. In order to expand her business, Tansyk applied for a loan of 50,000 som (KGS) with Bai-Tushum Bank to buy eight sheep to fatten and sell. She plans to use the income from the sales to invest in additional livestock in order to improve her financial situation.

loans.use: to purchase eight sheep to fatten and sell in order to increase her income
